original: Queen Elizabeth I
translation: 伊丽莎白一世女王

original: Our ruler is weak, and a pretender has risen. She calls herself Gloriana, the Virgin Queen. She promises to rule England in its first Golden Age, an age of great writers, poets, privateers, explorers, spies and sailors. With our permission, she will work with vigor to rally the nation against the Spanish menace – wearing armor to the coast and exhorting the fleet to defeat the invading Armada.
translation: 我们的统治者软弱无能，一位王位觊觎着已经出现了。她称自己为童贞女王格洛丽亚娜。她承诺将会带领英格兰走进第一个黄金时代——一个拥有者伟大作家，诗人，私掠者，探索者，间谍和水手的时代。在我们的允许之下，她会尽自己的全力，将整个国家的力量团结起来抵抗西班牙的威胁——她戴着盔甲来到岸边，激励舰队的士气以击败来犯的西班牙无敌舰队。

original: Abdicate the throne to her.
translation: 让位给她。

original: Hire her as an advisor
translation: 雇她做顾问

original: Queen Catherine II the Great
translation: 叶卡捷琳娜二世“大帝”

original: The queen consort Yekaterina is a German princess, one stronger and with more political power than her incompetent husband. She is deeply familiar with the ideas of the Enlightenment, and will endeavor to lighten the burden of Russian serfs. Her plans are ambitious, Yekaterina wants to usurp the throne and expand Russia's borders into Ottoman lands and Poland. Will we help her in her endeavor? Shall we place her on the throne of Russia and allow her to rule us all?
translation: 叶卡捷琳娜王后是一位德国公主，一个相比她无能的丈夫更强大更有政治力量的人物。她十分熟悉启蒙运动的理念，并会努力减轻俄国农奴的负担。叶卡捷琳娜的计划是野心勃勃的：她想要篡夺皇位，并把俄国的边界延伸到奥斯曼和波兰境内。我们会帮助她完成她的野心吗？我们应不应该把她送上俄国的皇位并允许她统治我们？

original: Give her the throne!
translation: 把皇位交给她！

original: Make her an advisor, and use her political power in that way.
translation: 任命她为顾问，并好好利用她的政治能力。

original: Kösem Sultan
translation: 科塞姆苏丹

original: While the heir to our land is still too young to serve as ruler, the heir's mother Kösem Sultan have asked to officially serve as a regent ruler of the Ottoman Empire. She has already directed the affairs of this great state through her husband and one son. If she comes to power, she will rule in an era dubbed "The Sultanate of Women". She has never bowed to the whims of others but the madness and ineptitude of her progeny is a great concern. One promised made by Kösem Sultan is that she will use her wealth to support irrigation projects in the Egyptian desert. Shall we allow her to rule until her child is of age, and hope to influence her actions?
translation: 由于我们国家的继承人因为年龄太小还做不了统治者，他的母亲科塞姆苏丹已经正式请求成为奥斯曼帝国的摄政。她之前已经通过她的丈夫和一个儿子领导着这个伟大的国家。如果她上台，那么她所统治的时期将会被称作“女人的苏丹国”。她从未向别人的心血来潮所低头，但是她子孙的疯狂与无能是一个令人担心的问题。科塞姆苏丹承诺她将会运用她的财富了支持埃及沙漠中的灌溉工程。我们应不应该允许她在她的儿子成年之前统治这个国家，并尝试去影响她的行为？

original: Make her Valide Sultan, regent ruler of the Ottoman Empire!
translation: 让她成为苏丹皇太后，奥斯曼帝国的摄政！

original: She will serve the land better as advisor to her child.
translation: 她作为顾问才能更好地服侍这片土地。

original: Maria Theresa
translation: 玛丽亚·特雷莎

original: Her mere existence is enough to upset the balance of power in Europe, for she claims the throne of Austria at a time when that crown's union with the Holy Roman Empire and uncertainties about Austrian law means that there are a case to be made that she should not rule at all. Her strengths are many, and there are those that place trust in her and believes that she will fend off any attack from the powerful and warlike Prussian state. Maria Theresa has stated that she wish to oppress religious minorities in the empire, since any division could tear the land apart, but she will otherwise push for progressive reforms in Austria. Taxes will be imposed on the nobility, Austrian education improved and the army reformed so it can compete with our stronger neighbors. She also wish to ban witch burnings.
translation: 仅仅是她的存在就足以颠覆欧洲的权力平衡——即便奥地利与神圣罗马帝国的盟约和奥地利法律的不确定性都告诉她此举并不明智，她仍宣称着奥地利的皇位。她拥有着强大的力量，足以让许多人相信她能够抵挡来自强大好战的普鲁士的任何袭击。虽然在其他方面实行渐进式改革，她声称她将会在帝国内压迫少数宗教，因为任何集团都可能让奥地利四分五裂。为了与我们强大的邻居竞争，她将会向贵族征税，改进奥地利的教育并改革军队。她还希望禁止猎巫。

original: She is the ruler we need!
translation: 她是我们所需要的统治者！

original: As an advisor, there will be none better than Maria Theresa.
translation: 没有比玛丽亚·特雷莎更优秀的顾问了

original: Roxelana - Hurrem Sultan
translation: 许蕾姆苏丹——罗克塞拉娜

original: It may surprise you to learn that for many years, Ottoman sultans did not take legal wives – an effort to suppress competition in the harem. But the great Suleiman took Hurrem Sultan - Roxelana - as his legal wife and raised her above all women in the empire. The sultan takes her advice on diplomatic and military issues, and even let her act as an official correspondent to Christian monarchs on our borders. She persuaded Suleiman to limit Crimean slave raiding into her native Ukraine, and supported the construction of schools, mosques and hospitals.
translation: 为了避免后宫中的勾心斗角，奥斯曼苏丹们在很长的时间里都没有正妻。但是苏莱曼大帝却将许蕾姆苏丹罗克塞拉娜立为正宫，让她的地位处于整个帝国的所以女人之上。苏丹向她咨询外交和军事问题，甚至让她成为与帝国接壤的基督教君主们的正式信使。她说服了苏莱曼限制在克里米亚掠夺奴隶的行为，以避免让她的家乡乌克兰受难。她同时也支持了学校，清真寺和医院的建设。

original: Make her an official advisor - a statesman.
translation: 让她成为一个正式的顾问——政治家

original: Make her an official advisor - a spymaster
translation: 让她成为一个正式的顾问——间谍总管

original: Queen Christina of Sweden
translation: 瑞典的克里斯蒂娜女王

original: Our ruler is childless and feeble, some new blood on the throne is needed. The only legitimate child of the beloved Gustavus Adolphus, Christina Vasa, shows great promise. With the guidance of counselors, she might be able to keep Sweden as a major power throughout her reign. She is intelligent, with a great interest in all of the sciences and arts.
translation: 我们的统治者膝下无子而身体羸弱，王位需要一些新鲜的血液。受人爱戴的古斯塔夫二世唯一合法的孩子，克里斯蒂娜·瓦萨，看起来大有前途。有了顾问的指导，她也许可以在她的统治下保持瑞典作为一个大国的地位。她充满智慧，对科学和艺术有着浓厚兴趣。

original: Place her upon the throne.
translation: 将她送上王位。

original: Give her a place in the court - as an advisor, at the most.
translation: 在宫廷中给她一个职位——最多是顾问。

original: Germaine de Staël
translation: 杰曼妮·德·斯塔尔

original: Germaine de Staël, a young woman with an intelligence that has brought her great renown, has reached our court. She is a writer and an intellect who has hosted many salons and thus gained fame both in Sweden and in France. She opposes the growing tyrant Napoleon with her pen, her novels thin allegories for the plight of freedom in France. Napoleon greatly respects Germaine de Staël's talents, and has been known to say that she "taught people to think, and reminded those who had forgotten how".
translation: 杰曼妮·德·斯塔尔，一位因其智慧而极负盛名的年轻女子，已经来到了我们的宫廷。她是一位作家和知识分子，因主持了许多沙龙而在法国和瑞典都积攒了相当的名气。她用手中的笔抵抗着崛起中的独裁者拿破仑，她的小说巧妙地暗喻着法国国内自由所处的困境。拿破仑非常尊敬杰曼妮·德·斯塔尔的天赋，而且还称赞她「教会了人们如何去思考，并提醒了那些已经忘记如何思考的人们」。

original: With her skills, we should hire her as spymaster.
translation: 我们应该雇她做间谍总管。

original: She will make an excellent statesman!
translation: 她会是一个优秀的政治家！

original: Mary Wollstonecraft
translation: 玛丽·沃斯通克拉夫特

original: The great intellect of Mary Wollstonecraft has caught our attention. She is a philosopher, historian and novelist, famous for her tract "A Vindication of the Rights of Women". It clearly explains the moral and pragmatic case for extending basic human and political rights to women. She argues that a political and social division between men and women defied reason, and that any logical society would use both sexes to their full advantage. Mary Wollstonecraft has toured Sweden and Norway, which she then portrayed in a travel writing which, according to her, made her husband fall in love.
translation: 玛丽·沃斯通克拉夫特的智慧吸引了我们的注意。她是一位哲学家，历史学家和小说家，以作品《女权辩护》闻名。这本书清晰地从道德和实用两方面解释了将人权以及政治权利延伸至女性的优点。她认为女人和男人之间在政治和社会上的分隔是不符合理智的，任何一个理性的社会都应该充分利用两性各自的长处。玛丽·沃斯通克拉夫特还声称她在挪威和瑞典旅行时写下的游记正是使得她的丈夫与她坠入爱河的原因。

original: Her ideas are most refreshing, hire her as an advisor!
translation: 她的想法令人耳目一新，雇她做顾问！

original: Wollstonecraft will never be forgotten.
translation: 沃斯通克拉夫特永远不会被遗忘

original: Aphra Behn
translation: 埃芙拉·贝恩

original: Aphra Behn is a Restoration era English writer – and one of the first English women to make a career out of it – but she has a secret. She is also a spy for our ruler. As a writer, she focused on popular works that tend to enhance the status quo and also revel in the new freedoms of entertainment in post-Puritan England. As a spy, she works in the Netherlands to seek out regicides that may have been plotting against the new regime. Behn works to turn Puritans into double-agents for the monarchy and uses her pen to attack Parliamentary enemies of the king.
translation: 埃芙拉·贝恩是一位英国王政复古时期的作家，同时也是最早以作家为职业的英国女性之一。但她有一个秘密。她还是我们统治者的一位间谍。作为一个作家，她主要致力于创作鼓励维持现状的受欢迎的作品，同时也陶醉于后清教徒时期英格兰娱乐自由的氛围中。作为一个间谍，她在荷兰工作，寻找可能要计划推翻新政权的叛乱分子。贝恩的工作包括了把清教徒变成君主的双面间谍，并同时用她的笔来攻击国王在议会中的敌人。

original: Recall her from action and make her an advisor.
translation: 将她召回并任命她为顾问

original: Keep this a close secret!
translation: 坚守这个秘密！

original: Eliza Lucas
translation: 艾莉萨·卢卡斯

original: Born in Antigua, Eliza Lucas moved to South Carolina as a teenager with her family. She soon assumed a position of responsibility for managing the plantation and its slaves at this early age and experimented with a number of different seed in an effort to diversify the South Carolina farming industry which, at this point, was heavily dependent on rice. Indigo proved to be the saving crop and would enrich South Carolina for years. She married a wealthy planter named Pinckney and raised two sons who would be Founding Fathers of the new American republic.
translation: 出生于安提瓜的艾莉萨·卢卡斯在青年时就随着家庭来到了南卡罗来纳。很快年轻的她就开始负责管理种植园和其中的奴隶，并为了改变当时南卡罗来纳以单一作物大米为主的现状对多种不同种子进行了实验。她最后发现了靛青，这种作物拯救了南卡罗来纳的农业并让种植园主们都富裕了起来。她和一个富有的种植园主平克尼结婚，并生下来两个在不久的将来会成为新的美利坚共和国的开国元勋。

original: Her knowledge would be useful for us, we should consider her as an advisor.
translation: 她的知识对我们是有帮助的，我们应该考虑任命她为顾问

original: She is a great example to us all.
translation: 对我们所有人来讲她都是一个优秀的榜样

original: Isabella of Castile
translation: 卡斯蒂利亚的伊莎贝拉

original: While not the primary candidate for the throne few can deny the talents and virtues of the young princess Isabella. As a daughter of the powerful Trastamara family she has managed to secure powerful allies through marriage who support her claim to our throne. Few can tell what the future has in store for our country but even for those who are unhappy with the rule of [Root.Monarch.GetName] Isabella is held to be a given candidate to be [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] successor.
translation: 虽然不是王储，但人们都认同年轻公主伊莎贝拉的才华和美德。作为强大的特拉斯塔玛家族的女儿，她还通过联姻获得了强大的盟友以支持她宣称王位。没人能预测王国的未来，但即使是那些不喜欢 [Root.Monarch.GetName]伊莎贝拉的人也承认了她作为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]继承人的权利

original: The throne is hers.
translation: 这个王位是她的

original: Her political power can be used elsewhere.
translation: 她的政治力量可以被用在其他地方

original: Sophie Germain
translation: 索菲·热尔曼

original: The Paris Academy of Sciences has awarded Marie-Sophie Germain the grand prize for her essay on elasticity theory. She gained her education from books in her father's library and from correspondence with famous mathematicians such as Lagrange, Legendre, and Gauss. Prejudice against her gender has prevented her from making a career out of mathematics, but Sophie Germain is a mathematician, physicist, and philosopher in her own right.
translation: 巴黎科学院已经因玛丽-索菲·热尔曼的一篇有关弹性理论的论文颁给了她一项大奖。她所受的教育来自她父亲的图书馆中的书以及与著名数学家——拉格朗日，勒让德，高斯——的通信。对她性别的偏见使得她无法以数学为职业，但是一个当之无愧的数学家，物理学家和哲学家。

original: If she will accept, hire her.
translation: 如果她同意，就聘请她。

original: How great for her, and us.
translation: 对她，对我们来讲都是那么的伟大

original: Caterina Sforza
translation: 卡泰丽娜·斯福尔扎

original: The "Tiger of Forlì" - Caterina Sforza - is a powerful ruler with a passion for hunting, warfare and alchemy. She left her children in the care of the Orsis to persuade the castellan, Tommaso Feo, to surrender the fortress of Ravaldino. Once inside, Sforza turned against the Orsis and promised vengeance upon them. The Orsis threatened to kill her oldest son, and she responded "Fatelo, se volete. Impiccateli pure davanti a me... qui ho quanto basta per farne altri!" ("Do it, if you want to. Hang them well in front of me...I have the mold to make more!") and showed her intimate lower parts to the besieging army. Her response shocked the Orsis and they did not dare touch Sforza's children. Sforza and her uncle Ludovico il Moro managed to defeat her enemies and regained possession of her dominions. Since her retrieval of her dominions, her political power has increased by exchanging gifts with the lords of the neighboring states and negotiating marriages for her children. She has shown both military and economical prowess by controlling her realm's spending and dealing in person with the training of her militia.
translation: 「弗利之虎」卡泰丽娜·斯福尔扎是一个热衷于打猎，战争和炼金术的强大统治者。在她与她的儿子被敌人奥尔西斯家族囚禁后，她主动要求向固守的拉瓦尔迪诺城堡主托马索·菲奥请降，并将儿子留在奥尔西斯家族作为人质。在进入城堡后，斯福尔扎马上反目，并声称将会对奥尔西斯家族复仇。当奥尔西家族威胁要处死她的长子时，她站在城墙上，一边说：“要杀要剐悉听尊便。就算是在我面前绞死他们也罢。。。我拥有一个可以做出新的的模具！”一边向攻城部队露出自己的私处。她的反应让奥尔西斯家族震惊了，他们连她孩子的一根毫毛也不敢动。最后，斯福尔扎和她的叔叔卢多维科·伊尔·莫罗成功击败了敌人并拿回了属于她的领地。自从她拿回领地之后，她的政治力量通过与周围国家交换礼物并为孩子安排婚姻而不断壮大。同时，她对领地中收支的掌握和亲自训练民兵的行为也表现了她的军事和经济实力。

original: Hire her as treasurer.
translation: 任命她做财政总管

original: She will serve our country as a commandant.
translation: 她会以一个指挥官的身份服务我们的国家

original: Leave her to rule in peace.
translation: 让她好好统治自己的国家

original: Catherine de' Medici
translation: 凯瑟琳·德·美第奇

original: Born in Florence, Italy, Catherine de' Medici was married to Henry II, the King of France, at the age of 14. Henry II favored his chief mistress, Diane de Poitiers, over Catherine and excluded his wife from participating in state affairs. He died after a lance shattered in his face during a jousting, and Francis II became king. Catherine has great influence over her son, whose official acts all begin with the words: "This being the good pleasure of the Queen, my lady-mother, and I also approving of every opinion that she holdeth, am content and command that ...".
translation: 出生于意大利佛罗伦萨的凯瑟琳·德·美第奇在14岁时就嫁给了法国国王亨利二世。亨利二世因宠爱她的首席情妇戴安·德·普瓦捷而将妻子凯瑟琳排除于国事之外。在他于一次马上长矛比武中被长矛刺中面部而死之后，弗朗西斯二世成为了国王。凯瑟琳对于他的儿子有很大的影响，他所有正式的讲话都会这样开始：「承蒙我的皇后，我的母亲的好意，我也同意她的所有意见，我命令……」

original: Make her regent.
translation: 让她成为摄政

original: Keep her as an advisor.
translation: 继续让她做顾问

original: Amalie Elisabeth
translation: 阿玛莉 伊丽莎白

original: After the death of Wilhelm V, his wife Amalie Elisabeth rules Hesse-Kassel in the name of their son. She refuses to submit to the Emperor, whose forces has devastated Germany. To preserve her son's inheritance and her ancestral faith - Calvinism - she has continued the struggle.
translation: 在威廉五世去世后，她的妻子阿玛莉·伊丽莎白以他们的孩子的名义统治者黑森-卡塞尔。她拒绝顺从已经席卷了整个德国清教徒阵营的神圣罗马帝国皇帝。为了保护她儿子的顺利继承以及她家族的信仰加尔文宗，她继续努力抵抗着敌人。

original: She will rule in her own name.
translation: 她将继续以自己的名义统治

original: Great, keep her as an advisor.
translation: 很好，把她任命为顾问

original: La Malinche
translation: 拉·马林切

original: Born near the border between the Aztec Empire and the Mayan-speaking Yucatan Peninsula, La Malinche was sold into slavery by her family and eventually given to us as tribute. While she initially only spoke Nahuatl and Mayan dialects, but no [Root.GetAdjective], we had an interpreter who spoke [Root.GetAdjective] and some Mayan, setting up a relay until she had learned enough [Root.GetAdjective] to translate on her own. As translator and active participant in the Conquest, La Malinche was so prominent that she was almost invariably portrayed accompanying the conquistadors in native sources. Conquistadors agreed that she was critical to the expedition, with at least one describing her as the second most important contributor after God himself.
translation: 出生于阿兹特克帝国和说玛雅语言的尤卡坦半岛边界的拉·马林切被她的家庭作为奴隶卖出，最终作为贡品被献给我了我们。起初她只会说纳瓦特尔语和一些玛雅方言，却不会说[Root.GetAdjective]，我们需要通过一位会说 [Root.GetAdjective] 和一点玛雅语的翻译才能与我们交流，但在她的 [Root.GetAdjective] 水平够高之后就可以自己做翻译了。作为一个翻译和西班牙征服的积极参与者，她的地位如此之高以至于在本地的记载中几乎一直伴在西班牙征服者们的左右。许多征服者们都承认她对征服的重要性，至少有一人称她所作出的贡献仅次于上帝。

original: She'll be our new advisor!
translation: 她将成为我们新一任的顾问！

original: Make her a conquistadora!
translation: 让她成为一名征服者

original: How interesting!
translation: 真是有趣！

original: Juana Inés de la Cruz
translation: 胡安娜·伊内斯·德·拉·克鲁斯

original: The Tenth Muse", Juana Inés de la Cruz is called, is a self-taught scholar and poet of the Baroque school and a Hieronymite nun. She became a nun to be able to study as she wished, she wanted "to have no fixed occupation which might curtail my freedom to study.". The monastery's library has grown with Juana Inés de la Cruz's collection of books and writings. She has defended women's right to education in her letter "Respuesta a Sor Filotea" - "Reply to Sister Philotea", something that has brought the attention of many clerical men and their condemnation of her.
translation: 被称作「第十位缪斯」的胡安娜·伊内斯·德·拉·克鲁斯是一位自学成才的学者，一个巴洛克学校的诗人和一位哲罗姆派修女。为了如她所希望的那样尽情学习，她成为了一个修女，就如她所说的「有一个不会影响我学习的自由的非固定职业」。修道院的图书馆也随着她对书籍和文学作品的收集而丰富起来。在她的信《回复菲罗提亚修女》中她对女性受教育权利的辩护也为她招致了许多神职人员的注意和谴责。

original: She sounds like an intelligent woman, one we need at court.
translation: 她听起来像是一个我们宫廷急需的有指挥的女人

original: Her writing will be distributed all over our country!
translation: 她的作品将会在全国范围内传播！

original: Jeanne d'Albret
translation: 让娜·德·阿尔布雷

original: Even before her husband Antoine de Bourbon's death of a fatal wound in the siege of Rouen, Jeanne d'Albret had shown that she has a mind powerful enough to guide the highest affairs. She believes in humanist thinking, and individual liberty, something that has affected her rule and reforms. Long-lasting reforms to the economic and judicial systems of her domains are planned, if only she ruled the country...
translation: 在他的丈夫安托万·德·波旁在鲁昂围城中因伤而死之前，珍妮·德阿尔伯特就已经证明了她强大的内心足以管理最重要的国事。她信仰以人为本的思想和个人自由，这也大大影响了她的统治和改革。如果她能够统治这个国家，那么她所计划的在经济和法律方面长久的改革就得以实施了。

original: Just until her son is of age.
translation: 等她的儿子成年了就行

original: Keep her close to the throne, but not too close.
translation: 让她离王位足够近也足够远

original: Nzinga of Ndongo and Matamba
translation: 恩东果和马汤巴的恩津加

original: Born with her umbilical cord wrapped around her neck, a sign of a proud and haughty personality, Nzinga was the daughter of King Kiluanji and Kangela. Her father favored her and let her follow him both in war and in the governing of his kingdom. She was the envoy of her brother at a peace conference with the Portuguese governor João Correia de Sousa, and managed to persuade him to stop the marauding of Imbangala mercenaries in Portuguese service. During that meeting, the governor had placed a floor mat for her to sit on, which was appropriate only for servants according to Mbundu custom. Nzinga ordered one of her servants to get down on the ground and sat on the servant's back, which asserted equal status to the governor. It also proved her worth as a brave and confident individual. Although the negotiation succeeded, the treaty was never honored and Nzinga's brother committed suicide as he was convinced that he would never have been able to recover what he had lost. The country needs a strong monarch, and Nzinga has proved that she has the skill, the political power and the strength to assume the mantle.
translation: 作为基鲁昂吉国王和冈吉拉的的女儿，恩津加在出生时脖子上就缠着脐带，象征着她自豪傲慢的性格。她父亲十分宠爱她，在他南征北战和处理国事时都让恩津加都伴他左右。在与葡萄牙总督若昂·科雷亚·德索萨的会议中担任她兄长的使节时，她成功地说服了总督为给葡萄牙服务的印邦加拉商人提供护卫防止他们受抢劫。在会议中，总督为她提供了一张坐垫让她坐下，而在姆班杜的传统中只有佣人才会坐在上面。恩津加则命令她的一位仆人跪在地上供她坐下，使得她在会议上的地位与总督相当。同时这也证明了她的勇敢和自信。虽然与葡萄牙人的协商看似是成功的，但他们从未兑现这个条约，恩津加的兄长也因认为他永远无法重振自己的王国而自杀。国家需要一个强大的君主，而恩津加已经证明了她有能力，有足够的政治实力和坚韧的品质来胜任这个王位。

original: Bring her into the light.
translation: 让她上台

original: Let her rule from the shadows.
translation: 让她垂帘听政

original: Tarabai
translation: 塔拉拜

original: The daughter of Hambirao Mohite, famed Maratha general, is grasping for the throne. When Tarabai's husband Rajaram died of illness, she proclaimed herself as regent for her infant son Shivaji II and took charge of the war against Aurangzeb's forces. The war was led by her, and her skills in cavalry movement might have won her the war hadn't the Mughal emperor Aurangzeb died. Her strong character and administrative genius helped steer the country through desperate times, and would it would be good for the country to keep her in a place of power.
translation: 著名马拉地将军哈姆比拉奥·莫西特的女儿正在宣称着王位。在塔拉拜的丈夫拉贾拉姆死于疾病之后，她便宣布自己为幼子希拉吉二世的摄政并开始主持对奥朗则布的战事。这场战争完全由她领导，要不是莫卧儿皇帝奥朗则布去世，那么她在骑兵机动上的技巧恐怕已经帮她赢得了这场战争。她坚强的性格与天才的管理能力帮助了她的国家走出困境，如果她能够继续在位，那么国家一定会更加昌盛。

original: Let her mount the throne.
translation: 让她登上王位

original: No, her skills will be used elsewhere.
translation: 不，我们可以再其他地方用到她的能力

original: Jane Austen
translation: 简·奥斯汀

original: Sense and Sensibility", "Pride and Prejudice", "Mansfield Park" and "Emma", all books of romantic fiction written by Jane Austen, highlights the dependence of women on marriage to secure social standing and economic security. Her reviewers speak of her realism, biting irony, plots and social commentary. It is no wonder why her books have gained such fame both among those who read for pleasure and scholars.
translation: 简·奥斯汀写的许多浪漫小说——《理智与情感》、《傲慢与偏见》、《曼斯菲尔德庄园》和《爱玛》——都凸显了女人需要依赖婚姻来获取社会地位和经济安全的现状。对其作品的评论赞赏着她书中的现实主义，尖刻的讽刺，剧情以及对社会的评论。这也难怪她的书会在普通的读者和学者间都享有极高的名誉。

original: Our country benefits from having such a famous writer!
translation: 我们的国家得益于这样一位著名的女作家！

original: Our court is in need of a woman like that!
translation: 我们的宫廷需要这样一位优秀的女性！

original: Gráinne Ní Mháille
translation: 格蕾丝·欧麦丽

original: A woman known as Gráinne Ní Mháille has arrived at our court to petition the release of her sons Tibbot Burke and Murrough O'Flaherty, and her half-brother, Donal-na-Piopa. She is the Queen of Umaill, chieftain of the Ó Máille clan, a known trader and supposed pirate. "The Sea Queen of Connacht" they call her, owner of Hen's Castle. It was named so because of her first husband's attitude after he had taken a fortress in the Lough Corrib from the Joyce clan which first named it "Cock's Castle". When he died the Joyces tried to retake it but Gráinne Ní Mháille defended it vigorously and they became so impressed that they renamed it Caisleán na Circe, the "Hen's Castle". There's a legend, a story about her defending the castle from the English by taking lead from the roof of the fortress, melted it and then poured it onto the heads of the attacking soldiers. She withstood the siege until help arrived and the English were beaten back. Having her as our advisor or admiral could be worthwhile.
translation: 一个叫做格兰内·尼·沃莱的女人来到我们的宫廷来请求释放她的儿子蒂博特·伯克、默罗·奥弗莱厄蒂和她的同父异母兄弟丹尼尔·那皮奥帕。她是乌沃尔的女王，奥沃莱家族（即奥马利家族）的首领，也是一个有名的商人并被人认为是一个海盗。她被称为「康诺特的海上女王」，也是母鸡城堡的所有者。这一名字的来源是因为她的第一任丈夫从乔伊斯家族手里夺取了在科里布湖旁的一座被称为「公鸡城堡」的要塞。在他死后，格兰内·尼·沃莱在挫败乔伊斯家族收回这座要塞的企图时所表现出的英勇让乔伊斯家族印象深刻，以至于他们之后把这个城堡改名叫做了「母鸡城堡」。传说中她在抵挡英格兰人对于这座城堡的围攻时，她把城堡的铅制屋顶拿来熔化并浇到他们的头上。她成功地顶住了英格兰人的进攻，等到了援军到来并击败了他们。任命她为我们的顾问或者将领都是有益的。

original: Release her sons and half-brother, then make her our advisor.
translation: 把她的儿子和异母兄弟释放，并任命她为我们的顾问

original: Do as she asks and make her an admiral.
translation: 满足她的要求，并任命她为我们的海军上将

original: Just release the prisoners.
translation: 把她的儿子和异母兄弟放了就好

original: Julie d'Aubigny
translation: 朱莉·德奥比尼

original: The opera singer Julie d'Aubigny learned dancing, reading, drawing, and fencing while young. She fled to Marseille together with Sérannes, an assistant fencing master and they earned money by giving fencing exhibitions and singing in taverns and at local fairs. Julie d'Aubigny joined the opera company run by Pierre Gaultier in Marseille and left Sérannes for a young woman. The two lovers managed to get away from a convent by setting it on fire. Three months later, the girl returned to her parents and d'Aubigny was charged in absentia with kidnapping, body snatching, arson, and failing to appear before the tribunal. The sentence was death by fire.\nShe returned to Paris and asked an old lover of hers, the Count d'Armagnac, to persuade the king to grant her a pardon and a place at the Paris Opéra. The audience love her beautiful voice, her acting skill, and her androgynous appearance, but she has not gained as many friends amongst her fellow actors and actresses. Louis Gaulard Dumesny had bothered female members and thus earned himself a beating by d'Aubigny, Thévenard and her duel of wits are legendary and she defeated three noblemen in duels who challenged her after she kissed a young woman at a society ball. Though she might have many flaws, she is a diamond in the rough. What should we do with her?
translation: 歌剧家朱莉·德奥比尼在她年轻时就学会了舞蹈，阅读，绘画和击剑。她和她的击剑老师色让一起来到了马赛，在那里他们以表演击剑和在酒馆和集会中唱歌为生。朱莉·德奥比尼为了一个年轻女子离开了色让，加入了皮埃尔·戈蒂耶的歌剧公司。这对恋人为了逃走而放火烧毁了修道院。三个月后，德奥比尼回到了她的家人那里，发现她在缺席的情况下因绑架，盗尸，纵火和未出庭的罪名被判火刑。\n她回到了巴黎并请求她的一位旧爱阿尔玛涅克伯爵赦免她并给她一个在巴黎歌剧院的位置。虽然观众们喜欢她美妙的嗓音，精湛的演技和雌雄同体版的外表，但她没有如她的演员同事们那么多的朋友。路易·高拉德·杜梅斯尼因骚扰女演员而被德奥比尼揍了一顿，她与谢夫那德之间的斗智斗勇也为人传诵。在她于一个舞会上亲吻了一位年轻女子后，她被三名贵族邀请来决斗并成功击败了他们。虽然她也许有许多缺陷，但仍瑕不掩瑜。我们应该怎么做？

original: Invite her to court.
translation: 邀请她来宫廷

original: Make her a general.
translation: 任命她为将军

original: Keep her singing.
translation: 让她继续唱歌

original: Anne Boleyn
translation: 安妮·博林

original: The breaking of the Catholic Church began with king Henry VIII's desire to marry Anne Boleyn and the Pope's refusal to annul his previous marriage to Queen Catherine. Anne had refused to become the king's mistress and told him that the only way she would yield to his embraces was if he married her. The leader of the English Reformation, the Archbishop of Canterbury Thomas Cranmer declared Henry and Catherine's marriage null and void, then declared Henry and Anne's marriage to be good and valid. The pope immediately decreed sentences of excommunication against Henry and Cranmer. This resulted in the break between the Church of England and Rome, the Church of England was brought under the King's control. Anne became pregnant quickly and the future Queen Elizabeth I was born on 7 September, 1533. Disappointed in the gender of the child, and the three miscarriages that followed, Henry started courting Jane Seymour. In order to get rid of his wife, king Henry VIII charged Anne with adultery, incest, and witchcraft and sent to the Tower of London, where she awaits trial.
translation: 当亨利八世想要与安妮·博林结婚但教宗拒绝废除她于凯瑟琳王后的婚姻时，与天主教廷的决裂就开始了。安妮拒绝成为国王的情妇，她声称只有让国王与她结婚她才会投向他的怀抱。英格兰宗教改革的领袖，坎特伯雷大主教托马斯·克莱默已经宣布了亨利与凯瑟琳的婚姻无效，并承认了他与安妮的婚姻。教宗立即下旨废除了亨利和克莱默的教籍。这直接导致了英格兰教会与罗马教廷的分裂，而英格兰教会则处于国王的控制之下。安妮不久便怀上了身孕，并在1533年9月7日诞下了未来的伊丽莎白一世女王。出于对孩子性别以及之后三次流产的失望，亨利八世开始审判简·西摩。为了摆脱她的妻子，亨利八世以通奸，乱伦与行巫术的罪名指控了安妮，并把她送到了伦敦塔等待审判。

original: Save her, and make her an advisor.
translation: 把她救回，并任命她为顾问

original: Anne will be remembered fondly.
translation: 安妮会被人们记住的

original: Siti Wan Kembang
translation: 西蒂·万·肯邦

original: The queen of Kelantan is famous for her beauty and wisdom, said to be of Arab blood and a descendant of the royal lineage of Champa-Kelantan-Pattani. Siti Wan Kembang is known as a warrior princess who leads her army of female horse riders in battle on horseback while wielding a great sword. Her favorite pet is a barking deer, given to her by some Arab traders and she has had it inscribed on the gold coins. Puteri Saadong, princess of the ruler of Jembal, was adopted by Siti Wan Kembang after her mother died, and as Siti Wan Kembang is not married, Puteri Saadong will probably inherit the throne.
translation: 据说流着阿拉伯人的血液，有着占婆-吉兰丹-北大年皇家血统的吉兰丹女王以她的美貌和智慧闻名。有着战士公主之称的西蒂·万·肯邦坐在马背上挥舞着大剑，带领着她的女性骑兵们冲锋陷阵。她最喜爱的宠物是一个来自阿拉伯商人的赤麂，并将它印在金币上。占巴尔统治者的公主普提里·撒东在母亲死后被西蒂·万·肯邦收养，且因她常年未婚很有可能成为王位的继承者。

original: A new advisor!
translation: 一个新的顾问！

original: General, salute me!
translation: 将军，敬礼！

original: How quaint.
translation: 多么的有趣

original: Catherine of Aragon
translation: 阿拉贡的凯瑟琳

original: The first female ambassador in European history, Catherine of Aragon served the Spanish Court in England and proved the English wrong when they believed her to be easily manipulated. She married Henry VIII and served as regent of England for six months during which she played an important part in the Battle of Flodden. Catherine was an educated woman who commissioned the book "The Education of Christian Women" by Juan Luis Vives and was much loved for her progams of charity towards the poor. She was a patron of Renaissance Humanism, and a friend of the great scholars Erasmus of Rotterdam and Thomas More. Only one daughter survived infancy, Mary, and as Catherine had produced no sons, Henry VIII tried to annul their marriage which started the break with the Church of England and Rome. An intelligent woman who could do much good in our kingdom if only she was allowed to stay at court.
translation: 作为欧洲历史上第一个女性外交官，阿拉贡的凯瑟琳在英国为西班牙宫廷服务。当英格兰人以为她可以轻易地被操控时，凯瑟琳证明了他们是错的。她与亨利八世结婚，并在她做英格兰摄政的六个月中在弗洛登战役中扮演了重要的角色。凯瑟琳作为一个受过良好教育的女子，委托了胡安·路易斯·比韦斯写下了《基督教女性的教育》一书，同时也因她对穷苦人民的慈善而倍受爱戴。她是文艺复兴中人文主义的坚定拥护者，也是伟大学者鹿特丹的伊拉斯谟和托马斯·摩尔的朋友。因为她没有产下男孩且仅有一名女孩玛丽活过了婴儿期，亨利八世尝试想要废除他们的婚姻——这也是英格兰教会与罗马教廷决裂的导火索。如果允许她留在我们的宫廷，那么这位充满智慧的女子就可以带来许多的好处。

original: Offer her an advisor's role.
translation: 任命她为顾问

original: Banish her from court!
translation: 将她驱逐出宫廷！

original: Margaret of Anjou
translation: 安茹的玛格丽特

original: Our ruler suffers from bouts of insanity, and he suffered a complete breakdown when his son was born. Margaret of Anjou, his beautiful, passionate, proud, and strong-willed wife has already taken to rule the kingdom in his place. She understands her duty to protect the interests of the Crown fervently, a trait probably inherited from her mother and grandmother. Her mother fought to establish her husband's claim to the Kingdom of Naples. Yolande of Aragon, Margaret's grandmother, governed Anjou with a man's hand, put the province in order and kept out the English. She is the "champion of the Crown", by virtue of personality and family example.
translation: 我们的统治者长期受到精神失常的折磨，而在他的儿子出生时他彻底地崩溃了。他美丽，热情，骄傲而坚韧的妻子安茹的玛格丽特已经开始在他的位置上统治这个王国。她带着从她母亲和祖母那里遗传的热诚保卫着君王的利益。她的母亲为了建立她丈夫对那不勒斯王国的宣称而战斗。玛格丽特的祖母，阿拉贡的约兰德用如男人一般的手腕管理着安茹并抵抗着英格兰人的入侵。她因身上的美德和家庭的传统被称为“王位的冠军”。

original: She will make an excellent Queen!
translation: 她会成为一个完美的皇后!

original: Her words are wise and her personality strong. Make her an advisor.
translation: 她的言辞犀利，而且个性强烈。让她成为顾问吧。

original: Let her rule!
translation: 让她来统治我们!

original: Louise of Mecklenburg-Strelitz
translation: 梅克伦堡-施特雷利茨的露易丝

original: The Queen of Prussia is known for her angelic goodness of her heart, "the soul of national virtue", her charity and the love between her and her husband. Louise of Mecklenburg-Strelitz has nine children and the ear of her husband. She is always informed about political developments at court where uses her formidable intelligence and skill to make her husband's rule easier, and is the forefront for reformations.
translation: 普鲁士皇后因她被称为“民族品德之魂”的如天使般善良的内心，她的和蔼以及她与丈夫之间爱情而广为传颂。梅克伦堡-施特雷利茨的露易丝为她的丈夫产下了九个孩子并能在她丈夫那里说的上话。她时时刻刻了解宫廷上政治问题的动向，并用她的智慧与能力为他丈夫的统治减轻负担，同时她也站在改革的第一线上。

original: She should also be our advisor, not just our queen.
translation: 她不但是我们的皇后，还应该是我们的顾问。.

original: The queen brings prestige and diplomatic power to the court.
translation: 皇后会为我们的宫廷带来威望与外交力量。

original: Ayse Hafsa Sultan
translation: 艾谢·哈夫莎苏丹

original: Wife and widow of Selim I, Ayse Hafsa Sultan is the first "Valide Sultan" or Queen Mother of the Ottoman Empire. Her marriage to the then-prince Selim secured for him a powerful and valuable ally in her father Menli I Giray which helped the prince in his struggle for the throne. The Mesir Festival is held every year to celebrate the healing concoction of herbs and spices administered to Ayse Hafsa Sultan when she became ill. She rules as her son's de facto co-regent which signals a shifting status of the sultan's mother and her increased share in power.
translation: 先后作为赛利姆一世的妻子与遗孀，艾谢·哈夫莎苏丹是第一个“苏丹皇太后”——奥斯曼帝国的皇太后。她与当时还是太子的赛利姆的婚姻使太子获得了一个强大而宝贵的盟友——她的父亲克里米亚汗国可汗明里·格来，并在他为了王位的斗争中起到了极大的作用。每年人们都会举办梅塞节以纪念在艾谢·哈夫莎苏丹生病时所服用的由草药和香料制成的药汁。她以她儿子实际意义上的摄政的名义统治着国家，象征着苏丹皇太后地位的转变和她权利的扩大。

original: A female ruler!? Well, why not?
translation: 一位女性统治者？为什么不呢？

original: Keep her by her son's side as an advisor.
translation: 继续让她在她儿子的身边做顾问

original: Roshanara Begum
translation: 罗珊娜拉·贝古姆

original: She was the mastermind behind her brother's accession to the Mughal throne, and hadn't it been for Roshanara, Aurangzeb would have been killed by their father and brother. The imperial princess is a brilliant woman, a talented poet and one of the most notorious women in the Mughal Empire. It was she who demanded that their older brother Dara Shikoh be beheaded and his head sent to their father, who received it wrapped in a golden turban. The sight of his favorite son's head made Shah Jahan fall unconscious and he remained in a stupor for many days after the incident.\nRoshanara loves gold and land, and has gained both through corrupt methods, something that her brother frowns upon. Their relationship has deteriorated and Aurangzeb is about to strip Roshanara of her powers, banish her from his court, and order her to remain in seclusion and live a pious life in her garden palace outside of Delhi.
translation: 罗珊娜拉·贝古姆是她弟弟奥朗则布获得莫卧儿帝国皇位的幕后主谋，而且要不是有她，奥朗则布也会被他的父亲和兄长杀死。这位公主不但是一位伟大的女人和一位极有天赋的诗人，也是莫卧儿帝国最臭名昭著的女人之一。是她下令砍下她兄长达拉·西柯赫的头，并把他的头抱在金色的头巾里送给他们的父亲。沙贾汗在看到自己最喜爱的儿子的头颅时昏了过去，并在之后的许多天里都在麻木之中。\n罗珊娜拉喜爱金子和土地，而通过使用各种令她弟弟所不齿的道德败坏的方法她也成功得到了这两样东西。她与奥朗则布的关系不断恶化，最后他决定要剥夺罗珊娜拉的权力，把她驱逐出宫廷，并命令将她软禁在德里郊外的宫殿中让她过上虔诚的生活。

original: Ignore her brother, make her ruler instead.
translation: 无视她的弟弟，让她成为统治者。

original: Convince her brother that she'll make an excellent advisor.
translation: 说服她的弟弟，让她成为一个优秀的顾问

original: Abigail Adams
translation: 艾碧该·亚当斯

original: The first Second Lady and the second First Lady, Abigail Adams is the wife of John Adams, the first Vice President, and second President, of the United States. She is an erudite lady with an open mind and great intellect whose husband often seeks her advice on political matters and government. Political opponents refer to her as "Mrs. President" as she is very politically active, especially about women's rights. There is a letter from her to John Adams that says: "...remember the ladies, and be more generous and favorable to them than your ancestors. Do not put such unlimited power into the hands of the Husbands. Remember all Men would be tyrants if they could. If particular care and attention is not paid to the Ladies we are determined to foment a Rebellion, and will not hold ourselves bound by any Laws in which we have no voice, or Representation.". She advocates for married women's property rights, believes that women should not be content with only being companions to their husbands, that they should not submit to laws not made in their interest and that women should be educated.
translation: 作为第一位第二夫人和第二位第一夫人，艾碧该·亚当斯是美国的第一任副总统，第二任总统约翰·亚当斯的妻子。她是一位博学多识的女士，她的丈夫经常因她开明的思想与伟大的智慧而向她咨询国事。政治对手经常称她为“总统女士”，因为她在政治上非常地活跃，尤其是在有关女性权利的问题上。她与约翰·亚当斯的一封信中说“不要忘了女人们，而且要比你的先辈们更大方更善良地对待她们。不要把无尽的权利放在丈夫们的手上。不要忘了，只要他们有这个机会，所有男人都想要成为暴君。如果我们不更多地关心并注意女人们，那么我们就必将助长一次暴乱，而且使我们不再受任何我们所代表并有发言权的法律的限制。”她提倡已婚女性应拥有财产权，认为女性不应该满足于仅仅作为丈夫们的伴侣，声称女性不应该顺从那些歧视她们的法律并应该受教育。

original: She is already an advisor to her husband, now make her one for the country.
translation: 她已经是她丈夫的顾问了，是时候让她成为这个国家的顾问了

original: We hope she'll be able to influence our great country.
translation: 我们希望她能够影响到我们伟大的国家

original: Rani Abbakka Chowta
translation: 拉尼·阿巴卡·乔塔

original: She is known as the first female freedom fighter of India and is the Jain Queen of Ullal. Rani Abbakka Chowta fights against the Portuguese who insists that she surrender and pay them tribute. They are intent on capturing the strategically placed town of Ullal, but their attempts has so far been fruitless as Abbakka keeps repulsing them. The fearless queen is brave and trained in the different aspects of warfare and military strategy by her uncle Tirumala Raya, who also crowned her the queen of Ullal. She could become a great advisor, a skilled general, or even our ruler if we so wish.
translation: 她以印度的第一位女性自由斗士也是乌尔拉尔的耆那女王而闻名。拉尼·阿布芭卡·乔塔英勇地抵抗了想要让她投降并交纳贡金的葡萄牙人。葡萄牙人意图占领战略要地乌尔拉尔城，但是在她不懈的抵抗下使得葡萄牙人的攻击至今都毫无成效。授予她乌尔拉尔王位的叔叔蒂鲁马拉·罗耶同时也教给了这位英勇的女王有关战争和军事技巧各个方面的知识。她可以成为一位优秀的顾问，一位善战的将军，只要我们愿意，甚至是我们的统治者。

original: Advisor would suit her best.
translation: 她最适合顾问了

original: She will rule us.
translation: 她将会统治我们

original: We will take advantage of her training and make her a general.
translation: 我们会好好利用她所受的训练，任命她为将军

original: Sacagawea
translation: 萨卡加维亚

original: Lewis and Clark hired Toussaint Charbonneau and his wife Sacagawea, a Lemhi Shoshone woman, as interpreters and guides to accompany them on their expedition. They hired them when they discovered that Sacagawea spoke Shoshone, which would be helpful when they needed help of Shoshone tribes. She soon proved her worth when the expedition tried to trade for horses to cross the Rocky Mountain and used her to interpret. The tribe's chief was Sacagawea's brother Cameahwait. He agreed to let them buy horses and provided guides to lead them over the Rocky Mountains. Besides her role as interpreter and guide, Sacagawea's mere presence with the expedition showed their peaceful intent, as it was a token of peace.
translation: 刘易斯和克拉克在远征时雇佣了图桑·夏博诺和她的妻子，莱姆哈伊肖松尼人萨卡加维亚作为他们的翻译和向导。他们雇佣这对夫妻的原因是因为萨卡加维亚会说肖松尼语，这在他们需要肖松尼部落帮助的时候就会派上用场。不久之后，当远征队与肖松尼交易马匹以穿越落基山脉时，她就为他们做了翻译。部落的酋长正是萨卡加维亚的哥哥卡米亚维特。他同意把马匹卖给他们，并为他们提供向导帮助穿越落基山脉。除了作为远征队的向导与翻译，仅仅是她与远征队的合作就证明了印第安人对和平的希望。

original: Let us offer her a role as conquistadora.
translation: 让我们任命她为征服者

original: Offer her a position as advisor.
translation: 任命她为顾问

original: Pari Khan Khanum
translation: 帕里·汗·汗努姆

original: An excellent poet, well-versed in traditional Islamic sciences, and daughter of Shah Tahmasp I, Pari Khan Khanum is a Safavid princess and one of the most influential women in the land. She helped her brother Ismail II to the Safavid throne and has shown great promise. Perhaps she is the one that should be on the throne? Or at least behind it as an advisor.
translation: 作为一位优秀的诗人，沙阿塔赫马斯普一世的女儿，精通伊斯兰科学的帕里·汗·汗努姆是萨非王朝的公主，在这片土地上最有影响力的女人之一。她帮助弟弟伊斯玛仪二世登上了萨菲王超的王位，而且看起来前途无量。或许她才是应该登上王位的那个人？或者至少做一个顾问？

original: Put her on it.
translation: 让她登上王位

original: Keep her behind it.
translation: 让她做一个幕后的顾问

original: Meera Bai
translation: 米拉·拜

original: The mystic poet Meera Bai, devotee of Krishna, has just danced into our capital, singing about her love for Krishna. Her family did not approve of her devotion and piety, and she left them after her brother-in-law had tried to harm or even kill her several times. It is said that he tried to kill her by poison, but Lord Krishna changed it to Amrit. He placed iron nails in her beds but they turned into rose petals. She was locked in a room for several days without food, but Lord Krishna sent her plates of food each day and she sang beautiful bhajans for him as thanks.
translation: 黑天的拥护者，神秘诗人米拉·拜，刚刚一边跳着舞一边歌颂着黑天来到了我们的首都。她的家庭不认可她对宗教的狂热与虔诚，在她的继兄数次尝试伤害甚至杀死她之后离开了他们。据说他曾经尝试用毒药害死她，但是黑天把毒药变成了甘露。他把铁钉放在床里，但黑天把铁钉变成了玫瑰花瓣。她在没有食物的情况下被锁在房间里数天，而黑天每天都送给她一些事物，她则会高唱拜赞歌以示感谢。

original: Invite her to court and find her work as an advisor.
translation: 邀请她来到宫廷，任命她为顾问

original: Let her express her love for Lord Krishna as she wishes.
translation: 让她自由地表达对黑天的爱

original: Amina II
translation: 阿米娜二世

original: The legendary Muslim Warrior Queen Amina of Zazzau has returned to us in the form of her granddaughter, named after her grandmother. Like her grandmother, Amina II is a fierce warrior who loves fighting. The story of how her great-grandmother Marka, wife of her great-grandfather Sarkin Nohir, once found Amina holding a dagger exactly like a warrior is a favorite of Amina II, and the tales of how Amina forced Katsina, Kano and other regions to pay tribute only comes second to that story. We only hope that, if we give the throne to Amina II, she might be a bit more peaceful. If she does conquer other countries, we hope that she will not follow her grandmother's example, to refuse marriage and take a lover from among the conquered people only to kill him the morning after...
translation: 传说中的穆斯林战士女王，扎若的阿米娜已经回来了，以与她同名的孙女的方式。如她的祖母一样，阿米娜二世是一名热爱战斗的勇士。对阿米娜二世来讲，最爱听的就是祖母阿米娜在小时候如一个战士一般手握匕首的样子被她的祖母，萨尔金·诺西尔的妻子玛卡看见的故事。她第二喜欢的故事就是祖母阿米娜是如何强迫卡齐那，卡诺以及其他地区向她交纳贡金的故事。我们只希望如果我们把王位交给阿米娜二世的话，她会比她的祖母更加爱好和平一些。如果她真的征服了其他的国家，我们希望她不会走她祖母的老路——拒绝联姻，在被征服的人们中挑选一位情人而在事后第二天早上便把他杀死。

original: She will rule our country, as her grandmother once did.
translation: 就如她的祖母一样，她也会统治我们的国家

original: Perhaps we can make her an advisor instead.
translation: 也许我们应该任命她做顾问

original: Her nature would make her most suitable as a general in our army.
translation: 她的天性使得她最适合做军队中的指挥官

original: Mandukhai Khatun
translation: 满都海 哈屯

original: The spy and agent of Ming China Eslem killed Mandukhai Khatun's first husband Manduul Khan and the throne was left without an heir. She had the support and loyalty of General Unubold despite rejecting his marriage offer when she adopted Batmunkh, a seven-year-old orphan and direct descendant of Genghis Khan. He was proclaimed Dayan Khan and Mandukhai, with command over the Monghols, defeated the Oirats. The Western Mongols was punished for their constant civil wars by forcing them to follow five codes: Crests of helmets must not exceed two fingers long - Eat meat without a knife - Do not call your Ger an Ordon (Palace) - Do not refer to airag as tsegee - Sit upon your knees before khans.
translation: 在明朝的间谍伊兹梅尔暗杀了满都海可敦的第一任丈夫满都鲁汗后，王位失去了继承人。虽然她为了与成吉思汗的直系后代，一个七岁的孤儿巴图蒙克结婚拒绝了将领乌嫩博罗特的婚约，但是他仍然支持着满都海哈屯。在巴图蒙克成为了达延汗之后，控制着蒙古的满都海击败了瓦剌。这些西蒙古人因他们持续的内战而受到了五条惩罚：头盔上的鬃毛不得超过两指长，吃肉不得用刀，不得将你们的蒙古包称作宫殿，不得将马奶酒称作册吉，在可汗的面前要跪着。

original: We need her as a general!
translation: 我们需要她这样的将领！

original: Rule us, please!
translation: 请统治我们！

original: Advise us!
translation: 请做我们的顾问！

original: Ho Xuan Huong
translation: 胡春香

original:
A poet whose poems are subtle and witty, Ho Xuan Huong is a widow of Tong Coc and she lives in a small house near the West Lake in Hanoi. She makes her living as a teacher, earning enough money to travel in $COUNTRY$ and composes poems about places, people and politics. Ho Xuan Huong's poems are independent-minded and resistant to norms, using frank sexual humor and expressions in abundance. They are usually irreverent, full of double entendres, and erudite. An excerpt from the poem "The Jackfruit" shows her great humor:
My body is like the jackfruit,
Its skin prickly, its meat thick.
If you want to test it, then drive in your stake,
Don't fondle the surface, or sap will stain your hand.
translation:
文笔妙趣横生的诗人，陈福显的遗孀胡春香，住在河内西湖附近的一座小屋里。她以教书为生，赚钱供她在 $COUNTRY$ 各地游览并创作各地美景，百姓和政治的诗篇。胡春香的诗歌创作独立且拒绝常规束缚，大量使用有关性的幽默和表达。这些诗往往都玩世不恭，含有大量的双关和典故。她的诗《菠萝蜜》就体现了她的幽默：
妹身好比菠萝蜜，
瓣肥肉厚皮带刺。
君子若爱就打桩，
莫用手摸出浆渍。

original: We want her at court as our advisor!
translation: 我们需要她来到我们的宫廷做顾问！

original: Keep an eye on her, and make sure to collect copies of all her poems.
translation: 密切关注她，收集她所有诗的手抄本

original: Iníon Dubh
translation: 黑女儿

original: Fionnuala Nic Dhomhnaill is also known as Iníon Dubh - Dark Daughter - and is the second wife of Aodh mac Magnusa Ó Domhnaill, King of Tyrconnell, and the mother of Aodh Rua or Red Hugh and Rudhraighe Ó Domhnaill. She was raised in Scotland and because of this she gained many powerful connections which has ensured that O'Donnell's armies will never be in shortage of Scottish mercenaries. The king has grown senile and Iníon Dubh is now leading the territory while their oldest son Red Hugh O'Donnell sits imprisoned in Dublin Castle. Her son's claim is in jeopardy, and Iníon Dubh was forced to have her nephew Hugh Gavelach O'Neill assassinated as he tried to take the throne. While defending her son's claim, she is ruling the land in his absence and trying to have him released at the same time.
translation: 菲诺拉·麦克当那被称作黑女儿，是泰隆国王休·马格努斯·欧唐奈尔的第二任妻子，红休和罗瑞·欧唐奈尔的母亲。因为她在苏格兰长大而拥有当地广大的人脉，欧唐奈尔的军队从来不缺苏格兰雇佣兵。当国王逐渐衰老，而他们的长子红休·欧唐奈尔正在都柏林城堡被关押时，黑女儿正在领导着这个国家。她儿子对王位的宣称已经岌岌可危，而黑女儿也不得不暗杀了她的侄子，王位觊觎者休·欧尼尔。在保护儿子宣称的同时，她一边统治者国家，一边想法设法想让儿子获释。

original: She seems capable, make her ruler.
translation: 她看起来很有能耐，让她成为统治者吧。

original: Be sure to make her an advisor once her son has returned.
translation: 等她儿子获释后别忘了让她成为顾问

original: Rani Durgavati
translation: 拉尼·杜迦瓦蒂

original: The widow of Dalpat Shah and mother of the young infant Vir Narayan, Rani Durgavati has taken the reins of our kingdom in firm hands. She is a courageous woman with a great love for sculptures, which she has gathered in the temples of Khajuraho and Kalanjar fort. With the help of Prime Minister Beohar Adhar Simha and minister Man Thakur, she makes sure that the administration of the land is managed in a successful and effective way. Not long after her husband's death, the capital was moved to Chauragarh, a fort situated on the Satpura hill range of strategic importance. Rani Durgavati fears not battle nor death, and has said that "...it is better to die respectfully than to live a disgraceful life.
translation: 作为答拉帕·沙的遗孀和年幼的维尔·那拉衍的母亲，拉尼·杜迦瓦蒂用坚定的手段统治着我们的王国。这位勇敢的女人热爱雕塑，在卡久拉霍神庙和卡林遮要塞中都能看到她的藏品。在总管博哈·阿德哈·辛格和部长曼·塔库尔的帮助下，她用成功有效的方式统治着这片土地。在他丈夫死去不久，首都便被迁到了萨特布拉山脉中的战略要地扎拉迦要塞。拉尼·杜迦瓦蒂既不惧怕战斗也不惧怕死亡，她曾经说过“宁可有尊严地死去，也不要羞耻地活着”。

original: Make her our ruler until her son is of age.
translation: 在她儿子成年之前让她担任我们的统治者

original: Let her rule - with wisdom and guidance as an advisor.
translation: 让她以一个顾问的身份统治

original: Kateri Tekakwitha
translation: 凯瑟琳·德加圭塔

original: The young woman's face was scarred by smallpox and her eyes grew weak because of the disease. Tekakwitha or "She who bumps into things" was born in Auriesville and taken in with the uncle and aunts after her parents and brother died from the smallpox that had disfigured her so. She took the name Kateri - Catherine - when she converted to Roman Catholicism at age nineteen and left to live with a Christian community as she faced ill treatment and death threats because of her conversion. Five years after her conversion, she died in the arms of her friend Marie-Therèse, her last words "Jesus, Mary, I love you.". Witnesses say that her scars disappeared mere minutes after her death, her flesh finally mirroring the beauty inside with radiance and grace. She will be known for her charity, industry, purity, virtue of chastity and mortification of the flesh. A chapel was built near her grave site and pilgrimages have begun to honour her there.
translation: 这位年轻女子的脸因天花而伤痕累累，她的视力也因病而衰退。出生于奥利斯维尔的德加圭塔——莫霍克语中的“撞到东西的她”——在她的父母和兄弟因水痘去世后被她的叔叔收养。在她19岁皈依他罗马天主教之后她改名为凯瑟琳，在不堪因皈依天主教而受到的不公待遇和死亡威胁后她离开了家，在一个基督教社区生活。在她皈依五年后，她死在了朋友玛丽-特雷丝的怀抱中。她的遗言是“耶稣，玛丽，我爱你们。”目击者声称在她死后几分钟她脸上的伤疤就消失了，伴着光辉与恩典她的肌肤终于反映出了她的美丽。她会以她的和蔼，勤劳，纯真，贞洁与肉体上的伤残而闻名。在她的墓地边已经建起了教堂，朝圣者也已经开始到这里来纪念她。

original: We are humbled to have housed such a saint.
translation: 我们自愧不如

original: Maria Sibylla Merian
translation: 玛利亚·西碧拉·梅里安

original: The naturalist and scientific illustrator Maria Sibylla Merian has just returned from South America after two years. Malaria forced her home but her travels inspired her to work with her major work, Metamorphosis insectorum Surinamensium, about her careful observations and documentation of the metamorphosis of the butterfly. Jacob Marrel, a still life painter and student of Georg Flegel, is Merian's stepfather and the one who encouraged and taught her to draw and paint. Merian published her first book of natural illustrations, titled Neues Blumenbuch, when she was 28.
translation: 在经过了两年的旅行之后，博物学家和科学插画家玛利亚·西碧拉·梅里安才刚刚从南美回来。虽然疟疾使得她不得不回到欧洲，但是这段旅行启发她写出了他的主要作品《苏里南昆虫变态图谱》，包含了她对蝴蝶变态现象的仔细观察和记录。她的继父雅各布·马雷尔是乔治·弗雷格尔的学生，也是一位静物画家。就是这位画家鼓励并教会了她如何绘画。在她28岁时，她就发布了她的第一本自然绘画书《新花卉图鉴》。

original: We are in need of such a woman here at court.
translation: 我们的宫廷需要这样的女性

original: Make sure she is undisturbed in her work.
translation: 保证她的工作不受干扰

original: Kenau Simonsdochter Hasselaer
translation: 克瑙·西蒙斯多赫特·哈舍拉尔

original: During the war against the Spanish, a small town was besieged and every man, woman, and child worked fearlessly to rebuild the city walls that the enemy cannons had destroyed. One woman stood out among these brave townspeople, a woman who led the rebuild and who worked tirelessly day and night to carry earth to the city walls. Her name was Kenau Simonsdochter Hasselaer, a wood merchant in town, and she encouraged the people to keep fighting despite the continuing onslaught by the Spanish. Accounts written after the Spanish had retreated told of how she, together with most of the townspeople, stood on the earthworks erected and threw burning tar wreaths around the neck of the Spanish soldiers. At least one Spanish soldier jumped into the river to douse the flames and drowned from the weight of the armor. She is a humble woman, but inside her burns a fire that we could use...
translation: 在荷兰与西班牙的战争中，一座小城镇遭到了围攻，城中的所有男人，女人和儿童都在无畏地修复被加农炮所摧毁的城墙。一位指挥着重建，无时无刻地向城墙搬运泥土的女子在这些勇敢的市民中十分显眼。她的名字是克瑙·西蒙斯多赫特·哈舍拉尔，镇上的一位木材商人。她号召人们在西班牙人的猛攻下继续抵抗。在西班牙人撤退后写成的记录中讲述了她是如何与许多其他市民站在刚建成的工事上向西班牙士兵的脖子上套上滚烫的焦油“花圈”的。至少有一个西班牙士兵为了扑灭火焰而跳入了河中，最后因盔甲的重量而溺死。虽然她表面上是一个谦虚的女人，但是也许我们可以利用她内心中所燃烧的熊熊烈焰。。。

original: Then make her an advisor.
translation: 那么就任命她为顾问吧

original: Honor her in some way.
translation: 随便用什么方式来纪念她

original: We could use more leaders like her!
translation: 我们能用到更多像她这样的领导者！

original: Elena Cornaro Piscopia
translation: 艾莲娜·科纳罗·皮斯科皮亚

original: The Padua Cathedral was filled with University authorities, the professors of all the faculties, the students, and most of the Venetian Senators, together with many invited guests from the Universities of Bologna, Perugia, Rome, and Naples. Elena Cornaro Piscopia did not show any nervousness during the full hour she spoke in classical Latin to get her degree of doctor of philosophy by explaining random passages from the works of Aristotle. The audience listened with great attention as she spoke, and applauded with fervor as she was awarded the insignia of the doctorate, the book of philosophy, the wreath of laurel on her head, the ring on her finger, and over her shoulders the ermine mozetta placed by Professor Rinaldini. She is the first woman to receive a doctoral degree from a university, which wouldn't have been possible hadn't her family followed the advice of Giovanni Fabris to let her study under distinguished instructors. The title "Oraculum Septilingue" - master of seven languages - is well-earned, for she is proficient in Hebrew, Spanish, French, Latin, Greek, Arabic and Chaldaic besides her native tongue. Besides languages, she is studying mathematics, philosophy, and theology. She is an expert musician, mastering the harpsichord, the clavichord, the harp, and the violin.
translation: 帕多瓦大教堂挤满了大学的管理人员，各学院的教授，学生，大多数威尼斯议员以及来自博洛尼亚大学，佩鲁贾大学，罗马大学，那不勒斯大学的嘉宾。在她用古典拉丁语解释亚里士多德的文章以获得哲学博士学位的整整一个小时中，艾莲娜·科纳罗·皮斯科皮亚没有表现出丝毫的紧张。观众们在她演讲时听得十分专注，而在她被授予博士学位徽章，哲学之书，将月桂花圈戴在头上，戒指戴在手指上，并被里纳尔迪尼教授授予貂皮肩衣时，他们都爆发出了热烈的掌声。她是第一个在大学获得博士学位的女人，要不是她的家庭遵循了乔伐尼·法布里斯的意见并让她受著名教师的教育的话恐怕也是不可能的。她的称号“七语哲人”也是名至实归，因为她除了母语外还精通希伯来语，西班牙语，法语，拉丁语，希腊语，阿拉伯语和阿拉姆语。除了语言，她还在学习数学，哲学和神学。同时她也是一位音乐家，精通大键琴，击弦古钢琴，竖琴和小提琴。

original: Such a learned woman is needed at our court!
translation: 我们的宫廷需要这样一位博学的女人！

original: Her name and her accomplishments will be shared with the world!
translation: 她的名字和成就将会被整个世界所称颂！

original: Yekaterina Romanovna Vorontsova-Dashkova
translation: 叶卡捷琳娜·罗曼诺芙娜·沃伦佐娃-达什科娃

original: Recently returned from a tour through Europe, Princess Yekaterina Romanovna Vorontsova-Dashkova is a devoted and loyal friend to Catherine the Great. Though they were once estranged because of Yekaterina's scorn of the lovers Catherine chose as lovers who in her eyes disgraced the court, it is a more mature and forgiving Princess who has returned. During her tour, Yekaterina procured the entrée to the society of the learned in most of the capitals of Europe due to her literary and scientific reputation. This also gained her the appointment as Director of the Imperial Academy of Arts and Sciences in Russia, the first woman in the world to head a national academy of sciences. It was a failing institution that lacked prominence and intellectual respectability, something Yekaterina managed to restore in a critical time in the history of science. The transformation from natural philosophy practiced by gifted amateurs to a professional enterprise had just begun.
translation: 刚从欧洲旅行归来的王妃叶卡捷琳娜·罗曼诺芙娜·沃伦佐娃-达什科娃是凯瑟琳大帝忠实的朋友。虽然她们之间的关系曾因叶卡捷琳娜认为凯瑟琳选择的情人玷污了宫廷而疏远，这位王妃显得更加的成熟与宽容。在她的旅行中，她在大多数国家的都城中都因她在文学和科学上的名声而得以进入文化人的社交圈子中。这也使得他被任命为俄国皇家艺术科学院的主任，成为了欧洲第一个女性国家级科学院主任。尽管这所正在衰落的科学院缺少名气与学术上的尊重，但叶卡捷琳娜成功的在一个关键的时刻拯救了这所科学院，而它从一个有天赋的业余爱好者讨论自然哲学的地方到一个专业的学术机构的转变才刚刚开始。

original: Award her by making her an advisor.
translation: 将她升职为顾问

original: Her name will live on...
translation: 她的名字将会被传颂下去。。。

original: Marie Crous
translation: 玛丽·克鲁斯

original: It was the woman and mathematician Marie Crous who introduced the decimal system here in $COUNTRY$. She is an accomplished writer and teacher at Charlotte-Rose de Caumont La Force and her study on the decimal system was dedicated to "the saffron-tinted princess" Madame de Combalet, Duchesse d'Aiguillon, niece of Cardinal de Richelieu and her patron. The study has introduced two fundamental innovations: the decimal point to separate the mantissa of the decimal parts, and the use of a zero in the decimal part to indicate that a place is absent.
translation: 在$COUNTRY$开始采用十进制的正是女科学家玛丽·克鲁斯。她在夏洛特-罗斯·德·古蒙德·拉弗尔斯那里成为了一个有名的作家和老师。她的十进制系统是献给她的赞助人，红衣主教黎塞留的侄女，“藏红花色王妃”，艾吉永女公爵康巴雷夫人的。这项研究提出了两项基础的革新：用小数点来分隔整数和小数，并用零来表示某一位数不存在。

original: The decimal system will be of great use, just as she will be to our court.
translation: 她对于我们宫廷的用处就如同十进制对于数学的用处一样大

original: It is a great invention.
translation: 这是一个伟大的发明

original: Ohatsu
translation: 阿初

original: The Sengoku period in Japan was marked by civil war, social upheaval and political intrigue. Wife of Kyogoku Takatsugu and with family ties to both the Toyotomi clan and the Tokugawa clan, Ohatsu served as a conduit between the rivals and acted as a liaison. She took part of many of the political intrigues during this period, and is regarded as a shrewd negotiatior with great diplomatical skills.
translation: 日本的战国时期以内战，社会动乱和政治阴谋为标志。作为京极高次的妻子，阿初因为与丰臣氏与德川氏都有家庭关系而成为了这对宿敌间沟通的渠道。她参与了这段时代中许多阴谋，并被认为是一个拥有高超外交技巧的精明谈判者。

original: Her skills is needed here.
translation: 我们需要她的能力

original: That is admirable.
translation: 真是令人钦佩

original: Empress Dowager Xiaozhuan
translation: 孝庄太后

original: After the death of her husband Hong Taiji, Empress Dowager Xiaozhuan saw her son Shunzhi become emperor and stayed away from the political intrigue surrounding the young emperor. When he died and his son Xuanye became the Kangxi Emperor, she advised him and took care of his upbringing after the death of his mother. She wields a great deal of influence in the imperial court and is known for her wisdom and political insight. The luxurious conditions of the palace is not to her liking and she has always refused to hold any kind of birthday celebrations, claiming that it would be too costly.
translation: 在她的丈夫皇太极死后，孝庄太后在儿子福临登上皇位离开了围绕着这位年轻皇帝的政治漩涡。在他死后他的儿子玄烨成为了康熙皇帝时，孝庄太后则为他提供建议并在他母亲死后培养他长大。她在宫廷中拥有极大的影响力，并以她的智慧与政治远见而闻名。她不喜欢奢华的皇宫，而且拒绝举办任何形式的生日庆祝，声称这样太过奢侈。

original: She has sound ideas that we should make the most of.
translation: 我们应该好好利用她明智的想法

original: We should have her placed on the throne!
translation: 我们应该让她登上皇位！

original: Inés de Suárez
translation: 伊涅斯·德·苏亚雷斯

original: Born in Plasencia, Extremadura, Spain, Inés de Suárez came to South America to find her husband only to find that he died before she reached the New World. She became part of Pedro de Valdivia's expedition who set out to establish the capital of the territory. Suárez treated the sick and wounded, found water for them in the desert, and saved Valdivia when one of his rivals tried to undermine his enterprise and take his life. The city was founded in a fertile vally with an abundance of fresh water but also many natives who disapproved of the new settlers. Inés de Suárez took charge and defended the city against a native attack. Clad in a coat of mail, a helmet and a hide cloak over her shoulders, she rallied the soldiers on her white horse and encouraged them with words of praise. She led the men herself and the natives was driven away from the town. Her bravery led to a victory, and had it not been for her, the city would have fallen and the colonial expansion thwarted.
translation: 出生于西班牙埃斯特雷马杜拉省普拉森西亚的伊涅斯·德·苏亚雷斯前往南美来寻找她的丈夫，却发现在她到达新大陆之前他就已经死了。她成为了佩德罗·德·巴尔迪维亚的远征队的一员，启程为这篇新领地建立首都。苏亚雷斯治疗团队中的病人和伤员，在沙漠中为他们寻找水源，并在当巴尔迪维亚的一个对手想要破坏他的团队并把他杀死的时候救了他一命。他们将城市建在了一个水源丰富的肥沃山谷之中，但是山谷中仍有许多不认同这些殖民者的原住民。伊涅斯·德·苏亚雷斯带领着市民们击败了土著的一次袭击。穿戴着厚厚的甲胄，头上带着头盔，肩上披着皮制披风的她骑着白马集结着士兵们，并用豪言壮语激励着他们。她亲自带领着这些战士，最后将土著们彻底驱逐了出去。她的勇气使得我们获得了最后的胜利，要不是有她，这座城市恐怕就将沦陷，而殖民夸张也将受到阻挠。

original: Such bravery will be rewarded, make her our advisor!
translation: 她的勇气值得受到奖赏，任命她为顾问！

original: She is a true conquistadora!
translation: 她是个真正的征服者！

original: Her bravery is the mark of a true general!
translation: 她的勇气是伟大将领的标志！

original: Kaihime
translation: 甲斐姬

original: Narita Ujinaga was a retainer of the Hojo clan and father to Kaihime, a local heroine known for her bravery and beauty. The two of them were put under Gamo Ujisato's care after they had surrendered to Ishida Mitsunari, whose ally Sanada Nobushige had lost a retainer to Kaihime's sword. Her father had to leave for urgent business and a rebellion caused by Hamada Shugen and his younger brother arose. Kaihime's mother-in-law was killed, which made Kaihime seek to end the rebels. Brandishing a sword, the instigator and two followers were slain by Kaihime and the rebellion suppressed.
translation: 成田氏长是后北条氏的一位家臣，她的女儿甲斐姬则是一个以勇气与美貌闻名的女英雄。在他们向石田三成投降之后，他们便被蒲生氏乡照料，而在此之前石田三成的盟友真田幸村手下的一名家臣就已经死在了甲斐姬的剑下。在她父亲因事离开时，浜田将监和他的弟弟发动了一起叛乱。在甲斐姬的继母被杀害后，她决定镇压这些叛军。在煽动叛乱者和他的两个追随者被甲斐姬挥舞着剑杀死后，叛乱便被平息了。

original: We wish to hire her as an advisor.
translation: 我们希望能聘请她来做顾问

original: Give her control over one of our armies as general.
translation: 让她以将军的身份指挥我们的一支军队

original: Nazo Tokhi
translation: 那佐·托希

original: Sultan Malakhai Tokhi of the Tokhi Pashtun tribe has a daughter named Nazo Ana who is a learned poet and a courteous, loving and caring person. Her education and upbringing has been supervised by him, and she was trained and taught by learned scholars of Kandahar. Through her poetry and upholding of the Pashtunwali code, Nazo Tokhi has gained authority. Conflicts between Ghilji and Sadozai Pashtun tribes are often arbitrated by her, in order to encourage alliances against the Persian Safavid rulers. There are many tales about her, but one that we know is true is that she put on a sword and defended her deceased father's fortress alongside the men when her brother went to avenge their father's death. She was left in charge of household and fortress, and defended it vigorously.
translation: 普什图的托希部落苏丹马拉凯·托希有一个叫那佐·阿娜的女儿，她是一位博学的诗人，一个有礼貌的而充满爱心的人。她父亲监督着她的学习，请来了坎大哈最有学问的学者来教育她。通过她的诗歌与对普什图瓦里规则的坚定拥护，那佐·托希掌握了实权。她经常充当基尔吉部落和萨多扎伊部落之间冲突的仲裁者，从而促使普什图人联合起来抵抗萨非王朝的波斯统治者。虽然有关她的故事有许多，但是有一则我们知道是真实的：在他的哥哥为了父亲之死外出复仇时，她拿起了剑，并与男人们一起守卫着父亲的要塞。她被留下主持家事并英勇地抵抗了敌人对要塞的袭击。

original: Her wise words must be brought here!
translation: 她英明的言辞值得让所有人倾听！

original: Nazo Tokhi will be a general in our army.
translation: 那佐·托希将会成为我们军队的一名将军

original: Qin Liangyu
translation: 秦良玉

original: A battle-hardened general by the name of Qin Liangyu has once again blessed us with her presence. Her father made sure that she got the same education as her brothers and she is well-learned in history, the classics, martial arts, archery and riding, with a reputation for creating beautiful and thought-provoking poems. After her husband died in prison, Qin Liangyu took over his post as district commander of a chiefdom, and with her skills and experience from accompanying him during battles against local warlords, no one objected to that. Those under her command is called the White Cavalry and they have fought many battles against rebels, independence fighters and bandits throughout the years. She has been promoted to Commander in Chief, presented with four poems from our ruler and just been awarded the title Grand Protector of the Crown Prince, something few have been awarded.
translation: 这位身经百战的名叫秦良玉的将军的出现再次庇护了我们。她的父亲给了她同兄弟们一样的教育。她精通历史，名著，武术，骑术和射术，并以创作华丽而发人深省的诗篇而闻名。丈夫亡于牢狱后，她继承了他石柱宣抚使的职位。出于她高超的能力与和丈夫抗击本地军阀的经验，她的上任没有遭到任何反对。她所指挥的部队被称为白杆兵，在多年来与叛军、独立者和强盗的作战中积攒了经验。在她进京时，皇帝也为她赋了四首诗，她已经被升任为诰命夫人，并被授予了太子太保这一头衔。

original: She should lead our armies!
translation: 她应该指挥我们的军队！

original: Her experience and skills would be invaluable here at court.
translation: 我们的宫廷需要她的经验与能力

original: Ilona Zrinyi
translation: 伊萝娜 兹里尼

original: With the recent wars and upheavals in our country, the visit of Ilona Zrinyi, widow, heroine and combatant of the Kuruc army and renowned beauty, can only be seen as a gift sent from the Heavens. She was an active partner in her second husband Imre Thököly's uprising against our oppressors and defended the last remaining stronghold, Palanok Castle in Munkács, for three years against General Antonio Caraffa's forces. We are truly blessed, for she might be the one we have prayed for, someone who can lead our country, our army or give advise in these troubled times.
translation: 在我们国家近来的战争与动乱之中，著名的美女，弗朗西斯·拉科奇一世的遗孀，库鲁茨军的战士与女英雄伊洛纳·兹林斯基的来访无疑是上天的礼物。她积极参与着第二任丈夫伊姆雷·托库里对压迫者的起义，并在安东尼奥·卡拉法将军的部队的围攻下守住了最后一座要塞，穆卡切沃的帕拉诺克城堡长达三年。我们真是受到了上帝的眷恋，她就是我们所日夜祈祷需要的人物。她可以领导我们的国家，我们的军队，并在艰难的时刻给予我们建议。

original: She has been sent to advise us!
translation: 她是被上帝派来做我们的顾问的！

original: The Heavens have sent us a new ruler!
translation: 天堂送给了我们一位新的统治者！

original: A general sent from God will lead us to victory!
translation: 由上帝指派的这位将军会带领我们走向胜利！

original: Wang Zhenyi
translation: 王贞仪

original: Born in Anhui, Wang Zhenyi moved to Jiangning where she was taught astronomy by her grandfather, poetry by her grandmother, medicine, geography, and mathematics from his father and equestrian skills, archery, and martial arts from the wife of a Mongolian general. Her father took her with him when he traveled to Shaanxi, Hubei, and Guangdong which has broadened her horizons and enriched her experiences, giving her plenty of ideas and material for her poetry. When asked about her studies, she told us, "There were times that I had to put down my pen and sighed. But I love the subject, I do not give up.". Her beliefs in equality and equal opportunity for men and women shines through in her poetry, and Wang Zhenyi find social feudal values inappropriate, "men and women are all people, who have the same reason for studying.". The court has received the latest article from Wang Zhenyi, who is now an acclaimed scholar of astronomy, mathematics, geography, and medicine. It is called "The Explanation of a Solar Eclipse" and this, among many other astronomical and mathematical articles such as "Dispute of Longitude and Stars", "The Musts of Calculation" and "The Simple Principles of Calculation" has made us come to one conclusion and one only: we need her here at court!
translation: 生于安徽的王贞仪迁居江宁之后，由祖父教授天文，祖母教授诗歌，父亲教授医学，地理和数学，并从一位蒙古将军的妻子哪里学会了骑术，射术和武术。她与父亲一起到陕西，湖北和广东的旅行拓宽了她的视野，丰富了她的经历，并为她的诗歌提供了大量的想法与题材。当询问有关她学习的问题时，她告诉我们“有时我也会投笔叹息。但我喜欢这些学科，我不会放弃”。在她的诗中表达了她对男女平等的希望，并对封建的社会价值表示鄙夷，“男人和女人都是人，都有着同样学习的理由”。宫廷不久前才收到了王贞仪最新的文章，她现在已是一位有名的天文学，数学，地理学和医学学者了。这篇名为《月食解》的文章与之前她有关天文学和数学的文章——例如《经星辩》，《筹算易知》，《术算简存》——都已经让我们得到了一个结论：我们的宫廷需要她！

original: Honor her in the best way we can do.
translation: 用最好的方式来尊敬她

original: Let her come to court and enlighten us with her ideas and advices.
translation: 让她来到我们的宫廷，并用她的想法与意见来启发我们

original: Suriyothai
translation: 素里育泰

original: The loss is to great for the heart, we fear it might break in two and never be whole again! Our dear Queen Suriyothai has died, sacrificing herself to save our $MONARCHTITLE$. She rode beside him on a small war elephant together with their daughter Princess Boromdhilok, both dressed in armor and helmets. [Root.Monarch.GetName] was mounted on his chief war elephant when the enemy attacked. His elephant panicked and charged away from the enemy commander who gave chase but Suriyothai charged ahead and blocked his pursuit. The commander attacked her with his spear, fatally cleaving her from shoulder to heart and wounded Princess Boromdhilok also. Both died on the elephant and it was not until their helmets fell off and exposed their long hair that the enemy commander realized that he had fought a woman. The enemy was driven back, the bodies of Princess Boromdhilok and Queen Suriyothai brought to Ayutthaya to be buried and mourned there.
translation: 这一损失对我们来讲是那么的伤心，以至于我们担心我们的心会裂成两半而无法复原！我们亲爱的皇后已经为了拯救我们的$MONARCHTITLE$而牺牲了。她与女儿波隆摩蒂洛迦公主穿戴着盔甲骑着战象与他并肩作战。当敌人发起进攻时，[ROOT.Monarch.GetName]正骑在她的战象上。当他的战象收到了惊吓并转头逃跑，敌军的指挥官抓住机会冲上前去准备杀死他的时候，素里育泰挡住了他的去路。敌人的指挥官的长矛从她的肩膀刺入，劈开了她的心脏，同时也击伤了一旁的波隆摩蒂洛迦公主。两人都死在了战象背上，直到她们的头盔落下，露出了她们的长发，敌人的指挥官才知道他杀死的是两个女人。在击退敌人之后，波隆摩蒂洛迦公主与素里育泰皇后的尸体被安葬在了阿瑜陀耶。

original: We will mourn them but also celebrate Suriyothai for her bravery.
translation: 我们不但会为她悼念，也会赞颂她的勇气

original: Sayyida al Hurra
translation: 赛义德·胡拉

original: The prefect of Tétouan and ally of the Turkish corsair Barbarossa of Algiers is a menace to the fleets in the western Mediterranean Sea. Her name full name is Sayyida al-Hurra bint Ali ibn Rashid al-Alami, Hakimat Titwan - Sayyida al Hurra means "noble lady who is free and independent, the woman sovereign who bows to no superior authority." and Hakima Titwan roughly governor of Tétouan. She became governor when her husband, who she assisted in his business affairs, died. To avenge herself on the Christian enemy who had forced her to flee from Granada when she was but a child she turned to piracy. It provides an income with booty and ransom for captives and also keeps her dream of returning to Andalusia alive.
translation: 作为得土安的统治者和土耳其海盗阿尔及尔的红胡子的盟友，赛义德·胡拉是所有在西地中海行驶的船队的威胁。她的全名是得土安的哈基姆，赛义德·胡拉·宾特·阿里·伊本·拉希德·阿拉米，其中赛义德·胡拉意为“自由而独立的贵族女子，不向任何强权低头的女性君主”，得土安的哈基姆则大致意为得土安的统治者。她丈夫在世时，她经常帮助他处理商业事务。在她的丈夫去世之后，她成为了得土安的统治者。为了向迫使她在年幼时逃离家乡格拉纳达的基督徒敌人报仇，她开始了海盗的生涯。除了为她提供相当数量的赃物与赎金，这项工作也使得她重回安达卢西亚的梦想不至于破灭。

original: Offer her a position at court, as advisor.
translation: 在宫廷中为她提供一个顾问的职位

original: Give her command over our fleet and make her admiral.
translation: 将我们的舰队的指挥交给她，让她成为海军司令

original: Olympe de Gouges
translation: 奥兰普·德古热

original: The "Declaration of the Rights of Woman and the Female Citizen" by Olympe de Gouges challenges the inequality in our world between men and women. She is a strident advocate for female rights, the right of divorce and a member of the Society of the Friends of Truth which is an association with the goal of equal political and legal rights for women. Her "Contrat Social" - "Social Contract" - proposes marriage based upon gender equality. Where there is injustice in France or the colonies, you will find Olympe de Gouges. She is anti-slavery and have written several plays - for example "Zamore and Mirza" and "Le Marché des Noirs" or "The Black Market" - and articles such as "Réflexions sur les hommes nègres" - or "Reflections on the negroes" to plead the cause of the slaves. A statement from her about women's rights has been spreading lately, she states that, "A woman has the right to mount the scaffold. She must possess equally the right to mount the speaker's platform.".
translation: 由奥兰普·德古热写成的《女权宣言》挑战了我们的社会中男女不平等的现状。她是女权主义与离婚权利的强硬支持者，也是倡导男女政治与法律权利平等的真理之友会的成员。她所撰写的《两性之间的社会契约》提出了性别平等的婚姻。在法国及其殖民地中哪里有不公，哪里就会有奥兰普·德古热。她反对奴隶制，并为此编写了许多部剧本——例如《扎摩尔与米尔扎》与《黑市》——与文章，比如《关于黑人的思考》。她有关女性权利的一段话最近广为流传“既然女人有被押上断头台的权利，那么她们也必须拥有登上演讲台的权利。”

original: Our country needs her!
translation: 我们的国家需要她！

original: Encourage her to keep writing and send a copy to us.
translation: 鼓励她继续写作，并寄一本抄本给我们

original: Izumo no Okuni
translation: 阿国

original: Long before the troupe had reached us, we heard about the beauty and talent of the innovative Izumo no Okuni. She is a miko, a priestess of the Izumo Taisha shrine who travels all over the country to perform sacred dances and songs to get contributions to her shrine. The funds for repairing the main hall of Izumo Taisha has long been gathered, but Izumo no Okuni shows no sign of stopping. Her gaudy, musical, noisy and colorful performances are called Kabuki, after the kabukimono - homeless, disaffected and displaced young and old men and women outside of the society that her troupe consists of. Kabuki started as line dance and song with no plot, but it evolved into drama with the aid of Sanzaburo Ujisato, Izumo no Okuni's lover, partner and financier. The revue is a great success, known and applauded through the whole of $COUNTRY$.
translation: 在剧团来到我们这里之前，我们就已经听说了阿国的美貌，天赋与在艺术方面的创新。她是一位巫女，出云大社的女祭司，为了募集大社的修缮费而四处奔波表演念佛踊。虽然不久就集齐了足够的修缮费，但是她却完全没有停下的迹象。她所表演的花哨，吵闹，色彩缤纷而又充满音乐的表演被称作歌舞伎，这个叫法源自于“倾奇者”，意为她的剧团所包含的那些身处社会之外，无家可归，打抱不平而流离失所的人们。歌舞伎在开始时仅包含没有剧情的排舞，而在阿国的情人，搭档与赞助者名古屋山三郎的帮助下发展为戏剧。这一戏剧相当成功，在$COUNTRY$的各地都受到了极大的欢迎。

original: We would like to meet her, and offer her a position at court.
translation: 我们希望能够认识她，并将她邀请到宫廷中。

original: Kabuki sounds like fun, we should encourage it.
translation: 歌舞伎听起来很有趣，我们应该鼓励她。

original: Nora of Kelmendi
translation: 奇尔门迪的诺拉

original: Abandoned at an orphanage, adopted by her aunt and raised as a boy, Nora's life did not exactly begin happily. Her father was a noble warrior who fought against the Ottoman Empire and desired a son to help him fight against the oppressors and was disappointed when Nora was born. His sister secretly adopted Nora and when her brother desired to train the young "boy" as a fighter, she gave her approval. Nora was trained by her father and turned out to be the most beautiful girl in the country. Her beauty has been compared to that of a mountain fairy, a Zana. Her father regretted abandoning her at the orphanage and they reconciled. When Nora was visiting a city where a pasha resided, the pasha saw her and fell madly in love. He sent a trusted man to Nora's house and asked for her hand, by the laws of the Albanian Kanun, but Nora's family refused, stating that the Albanian Kanun did not allow for marriages with non-Albanians. The pasha did not take this well, unaccustomed with such refusal and raged, "Either Nora will become my wife or I will burn all of Malsia to ashes.". In order to break the siege the pasha had led to her town, Nora devised a plan to kill the pasha. She went to the pasha pretending to want to marry him. After the pasha, joyous with her presence, had sent his troops away she stabbed him with a dagger, kicked him and chocked him so that he could not scream. The pasha did not die, for he fell on the ground and as it is dishonorable for an Albanian to strike a man that is not standing or not fighting back, Nora fled before she could kill him. The Albanian army attacked, and Nora returned with an army of 300 women, killing the pasha in a duel.
translation: 被遗弃在孤儿院，被姑妈当做男孩子养大——诺拉的童年很难说是快乐的。他的父亲是一个抵抗奥斯曼帝国的贵族战士，希望生一个儿子来帮助他反抗这些压迫者。当诺拉出生时，他对这个女儿十分失望。他的姐姐秘密地收养了诺拉，并同意她的父亲将这个“男孩”培养成一个战士的想法。诺拉受他父亲的训练，并成为了整个国家最美丽的女孩。她的美貌被比作山精灵扎娜。他的父亲对将她遗弃于孤儿院感到后悔，并最终达成了和解。在诺拉拜访一座城市时，居住于这个城市的一位巴夏疯狂地爱上了她。他依照阿尔巴尼亚的卡努法典派遣了以为值得信任的人来到她家中，并向她求婚。但诺拉的家庭以卡努法典不允许与非阿尔巴尼亚人结婚的理由拒绝了他。巴夏对此表示不满，因这样干脆的拒绝而十分愤怒“要么让诺拉成为我的妻子，要么我就把整个马尔西亚变为灰烬”。为了击退巴夏对她所在城市的围攻，她制作了一个暗杀这位巴夏的计划。她来到他身边，假装愿意嫁给他。在巴夏于喜悦之中命令撤军之后，她用一把匕首刺中他并用脚踢他，同时掐住了他的脖子以免他的叫声被人听到。但是这位巴夏并没有死，因为当时他已经倒在了地上，而对于阿尔巴尼亚人来说，袭击一个已经倒下或者不做反击的人是不名誉的，于是诺拉便逃离了现场。之后，在阿尔巴尼亚军队反击时，诺拉带领着由300名女子组成的部队，并在一场决斗中杀死了巴夏。

original: As a reward for her bravery, make her an advisor.
translation: 任命她为顾问以表彰她的勇猛。

original: She has already proven herself as a leader, now make her a general.
translation: 她已经证明了自己作为领导者的能力，是时候提把她为将军了。

original: Martha Washington
translation: 玛莎·华盛顿

original: George Washington swept her of her feet and the young, wealthy widow with four young children fell in love with the man who would be the first president of the United States of America despite her protestations. Martha Washington runs five plantations left to her by her first husband Daniel Parke Custis and is feared by the London merchants who she bargain with for the best tobacco prices. The officers of the United States army remembers her fondly as she helped keep up morale among them with social evenings and plays. She is known as "Lady Washington" and was the first First Lady of the United States. Although she was opposed to George Washington agreeing to be President of United States of America and refused to attend his inauguration, Martha Washington hosted many affairs of state once he assumed office.
translation: 乔治·华盛顿彻底地把她迷倒了：这位有着四个孩子的年轻富有的寡妇和这位未来的合众国第一任总统——尽管她对此相反的断言——坠入了爱河。玛莎·华盛顿拥有她的第一位丈夫丹尼尔·帕克·柯蒂斯留给她的五座种植园，并因总是能为她的烟草卖出最好的价格而被伦敦的商人们所畏忌惮。因为她经常举办社交晚会与戏剧鼓励士气而被美国陆军的军官们所爱戴。她被称作“华盛顿太太”，并且是美国的第一位第一夫人。尽管她反对乔治·华盛顿成为美国总统并拒绝参加他的就职典礼，但是在他上任之后玛莎·华盛顿也主持了许多国事。

original: We will honor her as the First Lady of the United States.
translation: 我们将会把她作为第一夫人纪念

original: We would like to have her advise us on matters of state.
translation: 我们希望向她咨询国事。

original: Elizabeth Wilbraham
translation: 伊丽莎白·威尔布拉罕

original: The architect and creator of the Dutch baroque style of architecture Pieter Post met her when she visited the Netherlands, in Veneto, Italy and the Stadtresidenz at Landshut, Germany she studied Palladio and here in England she has designed family residences, churches and many other different kinds of buildings. Elizabeth Wilbraham is a member of the English aristocracy, an important architectural patron and a renowned architect who might be the first woman architect. Due to her gender, there has been many problems for her to pursue such an profession and she has often used male architects to supervise construction in her place.
translation: 她在前往荷兰时拜访了荷兰巴洛克风格的创造者和建筑师彼得·博斯特。在意大利的威尼斯她学习了帕拉迪奥的作品，而在德国的兰茨胡特她参观了著名的兰茨胡特住宅。在英格兰这里，她则设计了许多家庭住宅，教堂和一些其他建筑物。伊丽莎白·威尔布拉罕是一名英国贵族，一个重要的建筑行业的赞助人，同时也是一位有名的建筑师——也许是第一位女性建筑师。由于性别上的问题，她要追求建筑师这一事业的途中出现了许多问题，她也不得不聘请一些男性建筑师以她的名义监督建设。

original: Her accomplishments will not go unnoticed.
translation: 她的成就不会默默无闻的

original: Acclaim her as an architect and hire her!
translation: 称赞她的建筑师才能并聘请她！

original: Anna Bunina
translation: 安娜·布宁

original: Despite having a rather basal education due to being raised by various relatives, Anna Bunina is an acclaimed writer who supports herself with help from patrons, pensions awarded her by the [Root.GetAdjective] $MONARCHTITLE$s and profits from her literary works. The small inheritance her father left her was used to employ tutors to further her education. Alexander Shishkov is her mentor and she is an honorary member of the "Lovers of the Russian Word" and the "Free Society of Lovers of Literature, Science, and the Arts". As a woman, the membership for the "Lovers of the Russian Word" does not allow her to discuss her works with the group in person, and her relationship with the other members is rather oppressive although helpful in advancing her literary career. Her first work is titled "The Inexperienced Muse".
translation: 虽然安娜·布宁因由多个不同的亲戚抚养长大而仅受到有限的教育，她仍是一位受追捧的作家，并依靠着赞助人的帮助，[Root.GetAdjective] $MONARCHTITLE$们的养老金以及作品的稿费养活自己。他父亲留给她的有限的遗产被她用来聘请家教以继续她的教育。她的导师是亚历山大·希什科夫，同时她也是“俄语爱好者”与“文学，科学和艺术爱好者的自由社团”的荣誉成员。作为一个女人，她无法亲自与“俄语爱好者”社团讨论她的作品，而与社团其他成员的关系尽管对她的文学生涯不无好处，但是仍然是十分沉闷的。她的第一部作品叫走《没有经验的缪斯》。

original: We look forward to many more interesting books from her.
translation: 我们希望能够读到她更多有趣的书。

original: This is a woman we want to have as an advisor.
translation: 我们希望聘请这个女子作为顾问

original: Dorothea of Saxe-Lauenburg
translation: 萨克森-劳恩堡的多萝西娅

original: A strict woman with a great interest in politics and some influence, Queen Dorothea of Saxe-Lauenburg participates in appointing and dismissing officials. Her lady-in-waiting Birgitte Gøye was only fourteen years old when her family forced her to become engaged to Jesper Daa but with the queen's friendship she managed to break the engagement. Bishops and professors were told to investigate the matter which led to a new law that banned parents from arranging engagements for their minor children.
translation: 作为一位对政治抱有极大热情的严厉女人，萨克森-劳恩堡的多萝西娅积极参与着对官员的升职与罢免。她的侍女布里吉特·哥耶在十四岁时就被家人强迫与耶斯帕·杜订婚，但是由于她与多萝西娅之间的友谊，这位王后成功的帮她撕毁了这条婚约。主教和教授们被要求来调查这次事件，并建立了一项禁止父母为未成年子女安排婚姻的法律。

original: Her political interest and experience may be useful to us.
translation: 她在政治上的兴趣与经验也许能帮助我们

original: Good to know.
translation: 很高兴知道这件事

original: Mary of Hungary
translation: 匈牙利的玛丽

original: It is said that you could actually hear Mary of Hungary's heart break when she was brought the news that her husband King Louis II had fallen in the Battle of Mohács. The heart-shaped medallion worn by her husband during the battle is always worn by her and she vowed never to marry again. While her husband was still alive, she held significant authority and influence, and she has proved to be a determined and skillful politician. For example, she appointed Austria's ambassador, Andrea de Borgo herself and when political factions threatened the throne, she took control over one and neutralized another. She loves literature, music, and hunting and is an enthusiastic patron of many different arts. Her brother Ferdinand, king of Bohemia, made her regent of Hungary after her husband's death despite her reluctance. After he assumed the crown, her older brother Charles V, Holy Roman Emperor, asked her to be the regent of the Netherlands and assume guardianship over their nieces Dorothea and Christina of Denmark as Margaret of Austria, Duchess of Savoy had died. This post was even more reluctantly accepted by Mary, and she never enjoyed it although she served so well as regent that Charles forced her to retain the role. It felt like having a rope around her neck, she complained to her brother Ferdinand.
translation: 人们说，当匈牙利的玛丽听到她的丈夫国王路易二世在莫哈赤战役中战死的消息时，你可以听得到她心碎的声音。此后她无时无刻不带着丈夫在那场战役中所佩戴的心形奖章，并发誓不再嫁。在路易二世在世时，她是一位拥有着强大影响与权力，坚定而精明的政治家。举例来说，她亲自钦点了奥地利大使安德烈亚·德博尔戈，而在当政治实力威胁着她的位置时，她能通过各种手段，控制其中一个势力而消灭另一个。她热爱文学，音乐和狩猎，她也是许多艺术家的忠实赞助人。不顾她的反对，她的兄弟波希米亚国王斐迪南在路易二世死后任命她为匈牙利摄政。他的哥哥查理五世在登上神圣罗马帝国的皇位之后邀请她成为荷兰执政，并在萨伏伊女公爵，奥地利的玛格丽特去世后请她作为侄女丹麦的多萝西娅和克里斯蒂娜的监护人。虽然在接受荷兰执政一职时她显得更加的反感且在就职后从未享受过这个工作，但是她的对荷兰的管理相当有效，以至于查理五世强迫她继续担任这个职位。她曾向她的哥哥斐迪南抱怨过“这个工作就像套在脖子上的绳索一般”。

original: She would be happier as an advisor to the throne. Make it so.
translation: 她一定会更愿意成为我们君主的顾问的。

original: Mary will rule our nation.
translation: 她将会统治我们的国家。

original: Margaret of Austria, Duchess of Savoy
translation: 萨伏依女公爵，奥地利的玛格丽特

original: The "Dame de deuil" - Lady of Mourning, a title given to her by her court historian and poet Jean Lemaire de Belges, - Margaret of Austria, Duchess of Savoy vowed to never remarry after her second husband Philibert II, Duke of Savoy died after three years of marriage. She broke new ground for women rulers as she first became the only woman elected as its ruler by the representative assembly of Franche-Comté. Her father, the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire, Maximilian named her governor of the Low Countries and guardian of her nephew Charles until he came of age and became Holy Roman Emperor himself. Her reign has brought relative peace and prosperity, she has negotiated a treaty of commerce with England favorable to the Flemish cloth interests, negotiated the Treaty of Cambrai, the so-called Ladies' Peace, together with Louise of Savoy and she acts as as intermediary between her father and her nephew's subjects in the Netherlands. Charles has recognized Margaret as one of his wisest advisers, after a short period where he rebelled against her influence.
translation: 被她的宫廷历史学家和诗人让·勒迈尔·德·贝尔热称作“哀悼之女”的萨伏伊女公爵，奥地利的玛格丽特在与萨伏伊公爵菲利贝尔二世结婚仅三年时就遭丧夫之痛，并誓不再嫁。她为女性统治者们创造了先河：她是弗朗什-孔泰唯一一位被代表大会选做统治者的女性，同时她的父亲神圣罗马帝国皇帝马克西米利安一世任命她为荷兰执政，并请她在她的侄子查理成年登上神圣罗马帝国皇位之前担任他的监护人。在她的统治下，低地国家迎来了相对的和平和繁荣：她与英格兰签订了对于佛拉芒布料交易有利的贸易条约，与萨伏伊的路易一同签订了康布雷条约，也就是所谓的“夫人和约”，同时她也是她的父亲与她侄子在荷兰的附庸之间沟通的中间人。在查理试图反抗她所施加的影响之后不久，他才意识到玛格丽特是他最精明的顾问之一。

original: If she has the ear of the Holy Roman Emperor, she will have ours as well.
translation: 要是她能让神圣罗马帝国的皇帝听她的话，那么她也能让我们听她的话。

original: This nation needs her as ruler.
translation: 这个国家需要她的统治

original: Isabella Clara Eugenia
translation: 伊萨贝拉·克拉拉·尤金妮亚

original: Together with her husband Albert, who died in 1621, Isabella Clara Eugenia, infanta of Spain and Portugal, was sovereign of the Netherlands in the Low Countries and after his death she was appointed the Governor of the Netherlands. Their reign brought a Golden Age, with peace and stability. Albert and Isabella first sought to make the Netherlands independent from Spain, something that proved impossible, so instead they worked to reincorporate the Southern Provinces into the Spanish monarchy. This was not popular among the Flemish social classes, but they did not give up their political agenda. The visual arts became their preferred tool and it proved perfect.
