The baroque had become popular and with Isabella's and Albert's patronage of artists such as Peter Paul Rubens, Pieter Brueghel the Younger, Coebergher, the De Nole family, the Van Veens and many others, the growth of this artistic movement was simulated and the Flemish Baroque painting created. The court at Brussels became full of people of all sorts, from artists and diplomats to defectors, spies and penitent traitors, from English musicians, Italian counselors, Spanish confessors, Burgundian functionaries, German bodyguards to the Belgian Nobles. Brussels is now considered a vital link in the politics of Europe, much thanks to Albert and Isabella Clara Eugenia.
translation: 西班牙和葡萄牙的公主伊萨贝拉·克拉拉·尤金妮亚与她的丈夫阿尔伯特一起统治着低地国家中的荷兰，而当阿尔伯特在1621年去世后，她被任命成为了荷兰执政。他们的统治为荷兰带来了一个和平稳定的黄金时代。阿尔伯特和伊萨贝拉起初尝试让荷兰从西班牙统治下独立，而在该企图被证明是不可能的事之后，他们开始尝试将南方的省份再次并入西班牙的统治。这一行为不受当地的佛拉芒人的支持，但他们并没有放弃。视觉艺术成为了他们宣传工作的重要工具，而且成效颇丰。巴洛克艺术变得越来越受欢迎，而随着伊萨贝拉与阿尔伯特对于例如彼得·保罗·鲁本斯，小彼得·布鲁格尔，科尔伯格，德诺尔家族和范温家族和许多其他艺术家的赞助，这一艺术运动被推广，并创造了佛拉芒巴洛克绘画。布鲁塞尔的宫廷中充满了各式各样的人，从艺术家和外交官到叛逃者，从间谍到反悔的叛徒，从英格兰的音乐家，意大利的顾问，西班牙的神父，勃艮第的公务员，德国的护卫到比利时的贵族。多亏了阿尔伯特和伊萨贝拉·克拉拉·尤金妮亚，布鲁塞尔现在已经成为了欧洲政治舞台上重要的一环。

original: A suitable role for her would be advisor for us.
translation: 她十分适合担任我们的顾问一职

original: We do need her to rule us.
translation: 我们希望她来统治我们。

original: Urszula Meyerin
translation: 乌苏拉·马耶林

original: Her beauty caught the eye of the queen who choose her as the king's mistress and Urszula joined the court when she was 22 years old as a chamberlain. The strict religious woman held great influence on the king and queen, but was very unpopular because of her involvement in affairs of state. Her favorites were appointed to state positions due to her influence and she was called many scornful things such as "minister in a skirt", "Jesuit's bigotry", the King's mistress and "obscene favorite". Despite many marriage offers, Urszula has never married. The Pope sent her a Golden Rose, who she corresponded with, as an award for an exceptionally virtuous life. The king is now old and often ill, something Urszula Meyerin has taken advantage of. She is the one who signs official state documents and receives foreign ambassadors, and is the ruler in all but name.
translation: 王后在发现了乌苏拉的美貌之后将她选做了国王的情人，这位年仅22岁的年轻女子便以一个管家的身份来到了宫廷。这位严苛而虔诚的女子极大地影响了国王和王后，但也因为对国事的干涉而受到厌恶。出于她强大的影响了，许多受她偏爱的人都得以被任命为高官，而这一的行为也使得她收到了许多人的憎恶，并被冠以“穿着裙子的总管”，“基督教的偏执”，“国王的情妇”和“淫荡的宠儿”等恶名。虽然乌苏拉受到过许多人的求婚，她仍然终身未嫁。与她经常通信的教宗授予她了一尊金玫瑰，以表彰她贞洁的生活。国王如锦渐渐衰老，百病缠身，而乌苏拉·马耶林也在利用这一点。她在官方的文件上签字，接待外国的使臣——除了一个名号以外，她才是真正的统治者。

original: Slowly relieve her of her powers and place her as an advisor instead.
translation: 慢慢剥夺她的权利，让她做我们的顾问

original: Then make her our ruler.
translation: 那么就让她成为我们的统治者吧

original: Elzbieta Helena Sieniawska
translation: 艾尔兹贝塔·海伦娜·谢尼奥斯卡

original: The wealthy, well educated lady-in-waiting of the queen Elzbieta Helena Sieniawska, married to Adam Mikolaj Sieniawski, Grand Hetman of the Crown, has finally managed to enforce that her property - inherited from her father the Polish Solomon - is hers and that her husband has no business with her business. Her great wisdom, reason and shrewdness is why she is often deployed on diplomatic missions and other obligations her husband cannot cope with. Many calls her "a great ruler and the First Lady of the Republic". She has meetings with the whole of Europe and is entangled in many political matters, including who will be put upon the [Root.GetAdjective] throne. The anti-Habsburg insurrection in Hungary, with the Prince of Transylvania Francis II Rákóczi as leader of the insurrection, had her support and the Prince her love. While trying to negotiate an agreement between the Tsar of Russia and the king of Sweden, she was abducted by the Swedish army and met with the king before she was released. Her husband negotiated with the Tsar his candidature to the throne, something Elzbieta disapproved of and threatened him with divorce if he did not stop the negotiations. Adam Mikolaj Sieniawski never managed to grasp the throne. Her unscrupulous acts as an politician has made Charles XII of Sweden refer to her as "that most accursed woman". She has many secret contacts with different camps and conducts various personal intrigues, many to reduce outside influence in the land.
translation: 王后的侍女，富有而受良好教育的艾尔兹贝塔·海伦娜·谢尼奥斯卡终于保住了她那被称为“波兰的所罗门”的父亲的遗产，并让他的丈夫，波兰的盖特曼亚当·尼古拉斯·谢尼奥斯卡意识到这笔遗产与他无关。她的智慧，理性和精明使得她常常被任命去执行外交任务和其他一些她丈夫无法解决的问题。许多人称她为“一位伟大的统治者和共和国的第一夫人”。她与整个欧洲的统治者们都有联系，同时也被卷入了许多政治漩涡之中，包括决定谁应登上[Root.GetAdjective]王位的问题。在匈牙利由特兰西瓦尼亚王子弗朗西斯·拉科奇二世所领导的反哈布斯堡叛乱也赢得了她的支持，而这位王子更是赢得了她的爱。在她尝试与俄国沙皇和瑞典国王间谈判时，她遭到了瑞典军队的绑架，并在与瑞典国王见面之后被释放。她的丈夫与沙皇谈判时提出让自己成为波兰王位候选人的条件，而艾尔兹贝塔对此表示强烈的不满，并以离婚相胁。亚当·尼古拉斯·谢尼奥斯卡最后也没能登上王位。她作为一个政治家不择手段的行为让瑞典国王卡尔十二世称她为“最受诅咒的女人”。她与各个不同势力都有许多秘密联系并在幕后引导了许多阴谋，其中不少都是为了让波兰摆脱外国势力的影响。

original: Wise, wealthy and shrewd - this is one woman we need behind the throne!
translation: 智慧，富有而精明-这是我们的君王身边所需要的女人！

original: This is the ruler we deserve!
translation: 这是我们应得的统治者！

original: Marie Louise Gonzaga
translation: 玛丽·露易丝·冈萨加

original: Before she married Wladyslaw IV, Marie Louise Gonzaga had a literary salon in Paris and spent many years in a convent. Before the wedding she had to change her name to Ludwika Maria as the name Maria is reserved for Mary, mother of Jesus here in $COUNTRY$. Not two years later, Wladyslaw IV died and she married John Casimir. The [Root.GetAdjective] nobility finds her a peculiar and scandalous woman, as she has very ambitious economic and political plans and keeps meddling with [Root.GetAdjective] politics. Active and energetic, she despises boredom and has many different hobbies to entertain herself. For example, she founded the newspaper The [Root.GetAdjective] Mercury, the convent of the Order of the Visitation of Holy Mary and opened the first literary salon in $COUNTRY$. Tito Livio Burattini thrives under her patronage and is currently building a model aircraft. Perhaps this Italian polymath will be the first inventor to fly?\nWhen the Swedes attacked, she led the [Root.GetAdjective] troops in repulsing the enemy. She is a formidable woman with a great deal of influence and political power.
translation: 在嫁给波兰国王瓦迪斯瓦夫四世前，玛丽·露易丝·冈萨加在巴黎经营着一家文学沙龙，并在修道院里待了许多年。在婚礼前，她将名字改为路易·玛利亚，因为在$COUNTRY$玛利亚这个名字是为圣母保留而不能用的。在不到两年后，瓦迪斯瓦夫四世去世，她便改嫁约翰·卡齐米日。[Root.GetAdjective]的贵族们都把她看做一个古怪而不体面的女人，因为她有许多野心勃勃的经济和政治方案，而且经常干涉[Root.GetAdjective]的内政。作为一个积极而充满活力的女子，她痛恨无趣的生活，并总是能找多许多不同的爱好来自娱自乐，例如创建了报纸《波兰水星报》，为圣母访亲女修会建立了一座修道院，并开办了$COUNTRY$第一家文学沙龙。在她的赞助下，提托·李维欧·布拉提尼得以迅速发迹，现在他正价制作一个飞行器模型。也许这个意大利博学者会成为第一个翱翔在天空的发明家？\n当瑞典人袭击时，她领导着[Root.GetAdjective]军队抵抗着敌人。她是一个值得敬畏的女人，有着相当的影响力和政治力量。

original: Her advice will be of great importance to us.
translation: 她的建议对我们来说非常重要

original: As a ruler, we hope she will be just as formidable.
translation: 我们希望她也能成为一个同样值得敬畏的统治者

original: Maria Carolina of Austria
translation: 奥地利的玛利亚·卡洛琳娜

original: The first time Maria Carolina of Austria saw Ferdinand she found him very ugly and she soon realized that he lacked the ability to rule. He relied on the counsel of his father Charles III of Spain and so she sought to gain his trust in order to get access to the Privy Council. Feigning an interest in hunting - Ferdinand's favorite activity - she obtained a back-door to the council but it was not until their son was born that she gained full access to it. The rejuvenation of the court life in $COUNTRY$ led to her increased influence and political power, and she began to rebuild the land. Together with John Acton, commander-in-chief of the navy and the army, she revamped the [Root.GetAdjective] navy by commissioning 150 ships and opening four marine colleges. Trade pacts with Russia and Genoa augmented the merchant navy, the ban on Freemasonry was revoked and she patronizes many artist such as Angelica Kauffman and Jacob Philipp Hackert. The relations between $COUNTRY$ and the Papal states has deteriorated but after a meeting with the Pope, where he presented Maria Carolina with a Golden Rose and ceded to the King the right of appointing bishops to vacant sees, it might not be too late to salvage the relationship.
translation: 当奥地利的玛利亚·卡洛琳娜第一次看到斐迪南多时，她觉得他十分丑陋，而在不久之后，她意识到他同时也不适合做一位统治者。他完全依赖于父亲西班牙国王卡洛斯三世的顾问，因此玛利亚试图赢取他的信任以接近枢密院。通过加装与斐迪南多有着同样的爱好——狩猎，她成功的得多了通往枢密院的后门，但直到他们的孩子出生，她才得以正式进入。$COUNTRY$宫廷的振兴使得她拥有了更多的影响力和政治力量，并开始重建这片土地。她与海军和陆军总司令约翰·阿克顿一同改组了[Root.GetAdjective]海军，下令了150艘军舰的建造，并创办了四所海军学院。她通过与俄国和热那亚签订贸易协定来扩大了他们的商船，重新发布了对共济会的禁令并赞助了许多艺术家，例如安杰丽卡·考夫曼和雅各布·菲利普·哈克特。虽然$COUNTRY$与教宗国之间有所交恶，但在教宗与玛利亚·卡洛琳娜会面并赠送给她一尊金玫瑰，同时将任命主教的权利交给国外之后，这段关系看起来还并非无可救药。

original: Continue as before, but make her position at court official.
translation: 提拔她为宫廷官员，并让她继续之前的工作

original: She is better fit to rule than our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 比起我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，她更适合当一个统治者

original: Marie Antoinette
translation: 玛丽·安托瓦内特

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] people were charmed by her personality and beauty when they first saw Marie Antoniette at the Tuileries, and exclaimed over her fair skin, straw-blond hair, blue eyes and her majestic tall figure. She was Dauphine of [Root.GetAdjective] until her husband Louis-Auguste became king of France and Navarre and she assumed the title of Queen. Her education was very poor, focused on manners and appearance. Despite this, she tried to gain influence at court but at the start, the King blocked her candidates, who could have helped her increase her political power. It took seven years of marriage before her first daughter was born, and the birth was difficult. The pressure of having a male heir weighted on her, and she took to gambling and buying expensive dresses. Slowly but surely she managed to increase her influence and became paramount in government by giving her support to marquis de Castries - who became Minister of the Navy -, marquis de Ségur - who became Minister of War -, Charles Alexandre de Calonne - who became the Financial Minister - and baron de Breteuil who became Minister of Royal Household. The ministers of the Navy and the War attempted to prevent the middle classes from reaching high positions in the Army and Navy, something Marie Antoinette supported. Spending money on dresses, buying houses and gambling, the [Root.GetAdjective] viewed her as an amoral, squanderer, ignorant foreign Queen who cared more about her country of origin than $COUNTRY$. This was untrue, and after the first failed Assembly of Notables, she abandoned her carefree activities to immerse herself into politics to try and save the country for her children's sake, to change the view the people of $COUNTRY$ had of her and help her depressed husband the King.
translation: 当[Root.GetAdjective]的人们第一次在杜乐丽花园见到玛丽·安托瓦内特时，他们无不为她的人格与美貌所折服，为她白暂的肌肤，稻草色的金发，碧蓝的双眼与高挑的身材所惊叹。她之前是[Root.GetAdjective]的太子妃，而在他的丈夫路易-奥古斯特成为法国和纳瓦拉国王后，她也成为了王后。她受到的教育十分有限，主要有关教养与外表。虽然如此，她起初仍然尝试影响宫廷，但有可能为她带来政治力量的候选人被她的丈夫所阻挡住了。结婚七年后，他们的第一个女儿才在困难中出世。诞下男性继承人的压力一点点地压在了她的肩上，使她不得不通过赌博和购买昂贵的衣裳来宣泄。慢慢地，通过她对之后成为海军部长的卡斯特里耶侯爵，后来成为战争部长的塞居侯爵，后来成为经济部长的查尔斯·亚历山大·德·卡洛讷与后来成为王室部长的布雷特伊男爵的支持，她在政府中获得了最高的地位。海军部长和战争部长尝试组织中间阶级登上海军和陆军的高位，而且玛丽·安托瓦内特也支持这一点。随着她不断地将财富花在衣服，别墅和赌博上，[Root.GetAdjective]越来越认为她是一个道德败坏，挥霍无度，蒙昧无知，比起$COUNTRY$更关心自己祖国的外国王后。这种说法是不公正的，而在第一次失败的名人会议之后，她放弃了她安闲的生活，积极参与政治，并尝试为了她的孩子们拯救这个国家，改变$COUNTRY$民众对她的偏见并辅佐她那抑郁的丈夫。

original: Place her as an advisor to the court.
translation: 让她成为宫廷顾问

original: Some of her reformation ideas could work.
translation: 她的一些有关改革的想法或许能派上用场

original: Anacaona
translation: 阿娜卡奥娜

original: The "Golden Flower" Anacaona, celebrated for her areítos, ballads and narrative poems, is a Taíno cacica or chief whose husband was Caonabo, chief of Maguana. A shipwreck took her husband's life when he had been captured and was on his way to Spain, accused of having organized an attack on a Spanish settlement. The ill-treatment from the Europeans made Taínos revolt against them, but Anacaona stayed neutral until the meeting house where a feast was organized by chieftains to honor her was set on fire. The Europeans burned the chieftains alive and arrested Anacaona and her noblemen. They were accused of conspiracy for resisting occupation and executed, all but Anacaona who was told that she would escape execution if she gave herself as concubine to one of the Europeans. She choose to stand with her fellow Tainos in solidarity, facing execution, when we managed to overcome the soldiers and free her and her countrymen.
translation: 因她所作的阿雷托——叙事曲与叙事诗——而闻名的“金花”阿娜卡奥娜，是一位泰诺族酋长，同时也是马瓜纳酋长卡奥纳博的妻子。在卡奥纳博被指控组织对西班牙移民点的袭击并被西班牙人俘虏后，他在被运往西班牙途中死于一场海难。欧洲人对泰诺人的虐待使得他们开始反抗，但是阿娜卡奥娜一直保持着克制——直到酋长们在举办一场向她致敬的宴会时被纵火。欧洲人们将这些酋长活活烧死，并逮捕了阿娜卡奥娜和她的贵族们。他们被控反抗占领者并被处死，除了阿娜卡奥娜——他们告诉她只要她愿意做其中一位欧洲人的情妇，便可以逃脱一死。他决定与她的同族人一起面对死亡，而就在此时我们的成功的击败了西班牙士兵，并解救了她和她的同伴们。

original: Offer her freedom and work as an advisor to us.
translation: 让她获得自由，并任命她为我们的顾问

original: No harm will come to her nor her countrymen.
translation: 没人会伤害她和她的同胞

original: Barbara of Cilli
translation: 采列的芭芭拉

original: The royal Order of the Dragon was created by Holy Roman Emperor Sigismund and Barbara of Cilli, Holy Roman Empress and Queen of Hungary and Bohemia. This order requires its initiates - selected nobility - to defend the cross and fight the enemies of Christianity. Serving as regent when her husband was absent, Barbara also administered large feudal fiefdoms and taxes independently, and was actively involved in politics and economy. When the two of them attended the Council of Constance, many were struck by her youth, vitality and beauty.\nWith the death of her husband in 1437 Barbara has taken on the role of a dowager queen, settling down in Bohemia and retired from political life. Despite this the Imperial court still views her with some suspicion. We could certainly benefit from her experience though giving her a position of influence might strain relations with the Emperor.
translation: 皇家龙骑士团是由神圣罗马帝国皇帝西吉斯蒙德和神圣罗马帝国皇后，匈牙利和波西米亚王后采列的芭芭拉创建的。这个骑士团中由贵族选出的团员们需要守卫十字架，并与基督教的敌人们战斗。在她丈夫不在时，作为摄政的她独立地管理着大量的封建领地与税收，并积极地参与政治和经济上的治理。当他们两人参加康士坦斯大公会议时，许多人都被她的年轻，活力与美貌所震惊。\n在她的丈夫于1437年去世后，她作为一位遗孀定居在了波西米亚，并结束了她的政治生涯。即便如此，皇家宫廷仍然对她有所猜疑。虽然通过给予她一个有影响力的地位可以让我们从她的管理经验中受益，但这无疑会使我们与皇帝的关系更加紧张。

original: A woman of our taste! Give her a place as advisor to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 这个女人符合我们的口味！让她成为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的顾问

original: Our nation is made more prestigious by her mere presence.
translation: 我们的国家因她的存在而更加伟大

original: Eleni of Ethiopia
translation: 埃塞俄比亚的爱兰妮

original: Three Emperors of Ethiopia has followed her guidance, and although Eleni never herself had any children by Emperor Zara Yaqob, his son by another wife loved her, called her mother and gave her the title of Queen Mother. Extensive estates has made her comfortably rich, though she seldom spends much money. A righteous woman with a strong faith, Eleni is often bustling around in the kitchen preparing food for the royal family and seeks the comfort of books in her spare time. Her great understanding of the affairs of state and her knowledge of the law has often been praised, and it is thanks to those two qualities that $COUNTRY$ flourished when she was an advisor to the crown. It was she who made sure we had allies when enemies threatened our land, by sending Mateus - Matthew the Armenian - as ambassador to friendlier nations. The palace coup which led to the deposition and execution of the former Emperor was led by Eleni, so it would be wise to consider her influence at court as a great power few of us possess.
translation: 埃塞俄比亚的三位皇帝都曾遵循过她的指导，虽然爱兰妮与皇帝扎拉·雅各布没有任何孩子，但是皇帝另一位妻子的儿子十分敬爱她，把她称作母亲并授予了她太后的称号。大量的庄园使她相当富裕，虽然她从未挥霍过任何财富。作为一位信仰坚定充满正义的女子，爱兰妮不是在厨房中忙着为皇室准备菜肴，就是在她的闲暇时间里在书籍中寻求慰藉。她经常因对国事的理解与在法律上的知识被称赞，而正是因为这些品质使得在她担任顾问时$COUNTRY$得以欣欣向荣地发展。她通过派遣亚美尼亚人马修作为友好国家的大使使得国家在受威胁时能有强大的盟友。她直接领导了废除并处决上一任皇帝的宫廷政变，所以我们必须慎重地审视她在宫廷中可怕的力量。

original: We would see her once more as an advisor in these times of need.
translation: 在危急时刻，我们会再次视她为顾问

original: No one would protest too much if we gave her the throne.
translation: 没有人会反对我们将她推上皇位的

original: Tun Fatimah
translation: 敦·法蒂玛

original: The Sultan did not accept Tun Fatimah's refusal to divorce her husband, and ordered her male relatives to be executed. Her husband and her father, the Bendahara - Prime Minister - Tun Muthair were also executed and Tun Fatimah finally complied. She became his third wife and bore him two princes and two princesses. Her people loved her from the start and she is a charismatic queen who rules the country behind the back of her figurehead husband the Sultan. The Portuguese fear her more than the cruel Sultan and she leads the [Root.GetAdjective] by the side of Tun Perak against their enemies. Under her hand, $COUNTRY$ has expanded and by marrying her children wisely to neighboring countries, alliances has been made.
translation: 苏丹没有料到敦·法蒂玛会拒绝与丈夫离婚，并命令处决她的男性亲戚。直到她的丈夫，父亲和她的盘陀诃罗——马来国家的首相——敦·穆特哈伊尔被处决后，她最终妥协成为了苏丹的第三个妻子，并为他生了两个王子和两个公主。人民们一直十分爱戴这位充满魅力，在她的丈夫这位傀儡苏丹的背后垂帘听政的王后。葡萄牙人害怕她更甚过残暴的苏丹，她与敦霹雳一同率领着[Root.GetAdjective]抵抗他们的敌人。在她的治理下$COUNTRY$不断地扩张，而在与周边的国家通婚之后建立起了强大的联盟。

original: Acknowledge her worth and make her advisor.
translation: 承认她的价值并任命她为顾问

original: It is time to make her the true ruler of $COUNTRY$.
translation: 是时候让她成为$COUNTRY$真正的统治者了

original: Khayr al-Nisa Begum
translation: 海尔·妮萨·贝加姆

original: Called Mahd-i Ulya - the highest-ranked cradle -, wife of the Shah Mohammed Khodabanda, Khayr al-Nisa Begum is a powerful political figure in her own right. She came to the Safavid court after her cousin Mir Sultan-Murad Khan had killed her father, and her desire for revenge has only just recently been slaked. The son of her father's killer, Mirza Khan, was seized by Khayr al-Nisa Begum's supporters as he was traveling to the capital and killed. She took revenge on the son as the father had already died, and with that her thirst for revenge was quenched. Her husband the Shah was weak-willed and a poor ruler whose sister Pari Khan Khanum tried to control him, but as she had insulted the Grand Vizier Mirza Salman and made an enemy out of him he managed to persuade the Shah and the Queen to have her strangled. Khayr al-Nisa Begum took control of $COUNTRY$ and by appointing friends and relatives to important posts she built a network of support which keeps her informed of all political developments in the land. She aims to promote her eldest son Hamza Mirza's career but holds enough power to safely rule the country herself.
translation: 被称为“第一名的摇篮”，沙阿穆罕默德·科达班达的妻子海尔·妮萨·贝加姆凭着自身的能力成为了一个强大的政治人物。在她的表亲米尔·苏丹-穆拉德·汗杀死了她的父亲之后她来到萨菲王超的宫廷，而她心中的复仇之火才刚刚被熄灭。弑父凶手的儿子米尔扎·汗在途经首都时被海尔·妮萨·贝古姆的支持者们抓获。因为他的父亲已经死去，她只能将复仇之火宣泄在他的儿子身上，并处死了他。她的丈夫，萨非王朝的沙阿是一个摇摆不定的失败统治者，因此他的妹妹帕里·汗·汗努姆开始尝试掌控这位沙阿。但是她所得罪的大维齐尔米尔扎·沙尔曼说服了沙阿和王后，并最终将她绞死。海尔·妮萨·贝加姆最终获得了对$COUNTRY$的控制，并通过指派朋友与亲戚为高官建立了为她效力的派系，并使他能够获悉在这片土地上发生的所有政治事件。她一面致力于提升长子哈姆扎·米尔扎的地位，一面保持着足够的力量来统治着这个庞大的国家。

original: Ambitious woman... Make her advisor and keep her from the throne.
translation: 一位野心勃勃的女子。。。让她成为顾问，但是别让她接近王位

original: $COUNTRY$ have need of a strong ruler, and she is not the worst choice we could make.
translation: $COUNTRY$需要一位强大的统治者，她恐怕不会是最差的选择

original: Sophia Alekseyevna
translation: 索菲娅·阿列克谢耶夫娜

original: The court was not open to women before Sophia entered [Root.GetAdjective] politics, which she did after the death of Alexis which brought her brother Feodor to the throne. He ruled under her thumb but as his health declined, so did her power as more people tried to take advantage of the sickly Tsar. At Feodor's death, Sophia two brothers were crowned senior Tsar and junior Tsar, with her to govern in their place as Ivan had both physical and mental disabilities while Peter, only nine years old at the time, was deemed too young to properly rule $COUNTRY$. By attending Feodor's funeral she formally entered the political scene and planned to secure the throne for herself with the help of connections, allies and capable politicians such as Prince Vasily Galitzine which she deftly utilized. It caused quite a commotion as women were kept from involvement in politics but Sophia managed to secure the throne with the help of the Streltsy, a military troop, and the uprising they took part of after Feodor's death. During the time she spent at Feodor's side, Sophia has acquired a good education and a political savvy that convinced the nobles and patriarch of her capacities to rule $COUNTRY$. Though she haven't governed the country for long, Sophia has shown that if she takes the throne, she will rule with a firm and heavy fist. She has already started preparations to further the organization of the military and to create an institution of higher learning.
translation: 在索菲娅于阿列克谢一世去世之际，一面进入[Root.GetAdjective]政坛、一面提携她的兄弟费奥多尔登上王位之前，宫廷从不为女人敞开大门。这位沙皇起初完全受到索菲娅的摆布，但随着他健康状况的恶化，越来越多的王权觊觎者使得她的控制越来越艰难。在费奥多尔去世时，索菲娅的两个弟弟被并列为沙皇，而因为哥哥伊凡在身体上和智力上都有缺陷，而当时只有9岁的弟弟彼得还无法统治$COUNTRY$，索菲娅成为了实际的掌权者。通过参加费奥多尔的葬礼，她正是踏上了政治舞台，并计划通过各种人脉，盟友与对例如瓦西里·戈力岑亲王的优秀政治家的巧妙利用来登上王位。当时女人还不允许参政议政，因此这一举动引起了不少骚乱，但在射击军的帮助之下她成功发动了起义并保住了她的地位。在她为费奥多尔垂帘听政时，她受到了良好的教育，而正是她所学到的对政治问题的见解使得贵族们和牧首相信她治理$COUNTRY$的能力。虽然索菲娅掌握国家才不久，她已经证明了一点：如果她登上王位，那么她一定会用坚定的铁腕统帅着这片土地。她已经开始准备扩军并建立一座提供高等教育的学府。

original: Sophia will govern the land as an advisor, nothing more.
translation: 索菲娅将以顾问的身份统帅这篇土地，仅此而已

original: Depose her brothers and make her Tsarevna!
translation: 废除她的弟弟们，让她成为女沙皇！

original: Madame Tussaud
translation: 杜莎夫人

original: Since her arrival in $COUNTRY$, Marie Tussaud has traveled with her collection of wax portraits, including those of Louis XVI, Marie Antoinette, Marat, and Robespierre. Born in Strasbourg, two months after her father's death, Marie moved to Bern with her mother who worked as a housekeeper for the physician and wax sculptor Dr. Philippe Curtius who taught her the art of wax modeling and employed her as an artist when she showed great talent for the technique. Her very first wax figure was of Voltaire. Though we cannot be certain that she tells the truth, she claims to have been employed to teach Élisabeth, Louis XVI's sister, votive making and that the royal family was very pleased with her work. Whispers of how she searched through sanitaries to find and collect the most illustrious heads to create wax portraits of might be true, for it is certain that she was employed to make death masks of the Revolution's victims.
translation: 自从杜莎夫人来到$COUNTRY$之后，她就不断地在各地展览她收藏的蜡像，其中包括路易十六，玛丽·安托瓦内特，马拉与罗伯斯庇尔。出生于斯特拉斯堡的玛丽在父亲去世两个月后来到了伯尔尼，与她同行的是她的母亲，医生和蜡像雕塑家菲利普·库尔提乌斯博士的管家。这位雕塑家把蜡像的艺术传授给了她，并在她表现出巨大的天赋时雇佣她为蜡像师。她的第一尊蜡像是伏尔泰。虽然我们不确定她说的是不是实话，但是她声称曾被聘请来教路易十六的妹妹伊丽莎白制作还愿祭上的祭品并受到了王室的青睐。有关她找遍被处决者的尸体堆以寻找最美丽的脑袋来制作蜡像的传闻或许是真的——因为我们知道她确实被聘请来为大革命中的受害者制作死亡面具。

original: A fascinating woman who will find her place at our court as an advisor!
translation: 这位令人惊奇的女人应该在我们的宫廷中成为一个顾问！

original: That is... bizarre but interesting.
translation: 这实在是很奇特。。。但也很有趣

original: Queen Pokou
translation: 波科女王

original: Led by their Queen Pokou, a group of people reached Komoe river after a long and onerous journey. The river was upset, swollen with water and seemed too dangerous to cross. The priest was consulted on how to cross the river safely, and after having contemplated the Komoe he said that a sacrifice was required, a loved one had to be given to the river to ensure safe passage for all. Pokou held her son closely before she with tears in her eyes threw the infant into the water, crying "Ba ouli" - the child is dead - as she saw her son disappear into the water. Her group took the name Baoule to honor the queen and her loss. Pokou and her people could safely cross the river on the back of hippopotamuses who appeared and formed a bridge for them. The Baoule settled on the other side of the river and though she mourned the loss of her son, Pokou ruled her people with compassion and wisdom.
translation: 在波科女王的带领下，一群人在经历了一次漫长而艰难的旅行后来到了科莫埃河。这条不停翻腾，涨满了水的河看起来过于危险，无法穿过。人们询问祭司如何安全地过河，而他在一番沉思之后声称科莫埃河需要一位受敬爱的人的献祭，才能让其他人安全通过。波科女王紧握着她的儿子，并将她扔进了湍急的水流之中，一面看着她的儿子被河吞噬一面哭喊着“巴欧利”——我的儿子死了。为了纪念这位女王和她的丧子之痛，这群人被称作巴欧利人。波科和她的人民最终在突然出现并组成了一座桥的河马背上穿过了这条河。巴欧利人之后便定居在了河流的另一边，虽然波科仍然为儿子的死而伤心，她仍然用怜悯与智慧统治者她的子民。

original: It would be our pleasure if she would become an advisor for us.
translation: 我们很希望她能成为我们的顾问

original: Her sacrifice will be honored by us.
translation: 她的牺牲不会被忘记的

original: More land for us!
translation: 更多的土地！

original: The Colorful Queens
translation: 彩色的女王们

original: The Green Queen" Ratu Hijau is the eldest daughter of Mansur Shah of Malacca and after her brother's murder she has worked hard to become queen of $COUNTRY$. After twenty years of unstable rule, she promises stability and prosperity. While her brother ruled, she tried to influence him into becoming well-disposed to merchants, create a [Root.GetAdjective] lingua franca and restore the country to greater glory, something she now promises will be realized under her rule. Her younger sisters Ratu Biru - the "Blue Queen" - and Ratu Ingu - the "Purple Queen" - supports her even though both could become queens in their own rights.
translation: “绿色女王”拉图·西加敖是马六甲苏丹满速沙的大女儿，在她哥哥被杀之后努力成为了$COUNTRY$的女王。在长达20年的动乱之后，她向人民保证了国家的稳定和繁荣。在他哥哥统治时，她试图说服他要优待商人，让[Root.GetAdjective]成为马来亚的通用语言并让国家重获过去的荣光，这些也是她现在登上王位之后所保证实现的。虽然她的妹妹“蓝色女王”拉图·比鲁和“紫色女王”拉图·印古都可以依靠自己的能力成为女王，但她们仍然坚定地支持着拉图·西加敖。

original: Ratu Hijau will become advisor, not queen.
translation: 拉图·西加敖会成为我们的顾问，而不是女王

original: Our new ruler is Ratu Hijau.
translation: 拉图·西加敖就是我们的新女王了

original: Appoint Ratu Biru as diplomat.
translation: 任命拉图·比鲁为外交官

original: Ratu Biru shall have the throne.
translation: 拉图·比鲁应该获得王位

original: Our new advisor will be Ratu Ingu.
translation: 拉图·印古将会成为我们新一任的顾问

original: Crown Ratu Ingu.
translation: 让拉图·印古登上王位

original: Rani Mangammal
translation: 拉妮·曼加姆尔

original: Chokkanatha, once ruler of $COUNTRY$, died and left the crown to his son Rangakrishna Muthu Virappa Nayak who died 22 years old, while his wife was pregnant. Devastated by his death, the queen committed sati after giving birth to their son Vijaya Ranga Chokkanatha despite Mangammal's, mother of Rangakrishna and Chokkanatha's wife, objections. This forced Mangammal to become regent and together with Dalavoy - Governor General - Narasappiah, she has led the country since. Numerous conflicts with neighbors has plagued her rule, although she has successfully managed the military campaigns and made the country prosperous with the tribute paid by the losers. She has overseen the reparation of irrigation channels, constructed new roads and planted trees to provide comfort to travelers. Tolerant of other religions, she is friendly with missionaries and has donated jewels to both temples and mosques. The people praise her work as an administrator and diplomat.
translation: 兰加克里希纳·穆图·维拉帕·纳亚克从死去的父亲乔卡纳塔手中接过了$COUNTRY$的王位，但在年近22岁时边离开了人世，留下了怀着身孕的妻子。悲痛欲绝的王后在诞下儿子维贾雅·兰加·乔卡纳塔之后不顾兰加克里希纳之母，乔卡纳塔的妻子曼加玛尔的劝阻进行了裟提——在丈夫去世后自焚而死。这使得曼加玛尔不得不与总管纳拉萨皮亚一同成为摄政，并从此统治这个国家。虽然多次冲突不断地撼动着她的统治，她仍然成功地打赢了许多战役，并依靠着战败国提供的赔款让国家繁荣起来。她监督着灌溉渠的修缮，铺设新路，种植树木，让过往的行人感到舒适。同时，她也容忍着其他宗教，与许多传教士保持着友好的关系，并同时向寺庙和清真寺捐赠珠宝。人民常常称赞她作为一个管理着和外交家的伟大功绩。

original: It is time for her to give the power to her grandson, and stay as an advisor.
translation: 是时候让她的孙子继位，让她成为顾问了

original: She is ruler in all but name, so let us give her what she justly deserves.
translation: 她现在已经是名副其实的统治者了，那么就让我们把国王的头衔也交给她吧

original: Anne Bonny
translation: 安妮·博尼

original: Red haired and with a fiery temper, the pirate Anne Bonny was captured together with her second husband Jack "Calico Jack" Rackham, captain of the pirate sloop Revenge. Bonny and Rackham fought Jonathan Barnet's troops fiercely but had to admit defeat as their crew was too drunk to fight and was ultimately captured. Rackham was hanged, but Bonny asked for mercy because of her pregnancy and was granted it. She was released not long after the birth of her son. The two of them have plagued the waters of the Caribbean for several months, seizing smaller vessels and looting them for an abundance of treasure. Bonny fought alongside the men, showing her competence and effectiveness in combat which gained her respect from her shipmates. This is a woman with skills we can use, either by making her an admiral or an advisor.
translation: 长着一头鲜艳的红发并有着与头发一般火烈的脾气的海盗安妮·博尼与她的第二任丈夫，海盗船复仇号的船长杰克“花斑”雷克汉姆一同被捕了。博尼和雷克汉姆勇敢地抵抗着乔纳森·巴内特的部队，但因为他们的船员醉得太厉害而不得不投降被捕。雷克汉姆被绞死，但博尼以怀孕为由请求赦免，并最终获释。在儿子出生不就她便获得了自由身。他们夫妻两人在加勒比海域横行了数月，登上较小的商船并将上面所有的财宝全部劫走。博尼与男人们并肩战斗，用她在战斗中所表现的能力与技巧赢得了船员们的尊敬。我们可以利用这个女人的能力，让她成为一位海军将领或者是顾问。

original: Advisor, then.
translation: 那么就是顾问了

original: Admiral, though we need someone to keep an eye on her.
translation: 让她成为海军将领，但是也许我们需要找人看着她

original: Lucrezia Borgia
translation: 卢克雷齐娅·波吉亚

original: Some women has only held worth in their families eyes because they could be married to wealthy and influential men, often many years their senior, to forge alliances, gain influence and founding in different matters. So was the case with Lucrezia Borgia, whose father Pope Alexander VI married her to three different men during her life to gain powerful alliances and founding. Her first husband was Giovanni Sforza, Lord of of Pesaro and titled Count of Catignola. He was offered Lucrezia's dowry in return for invalidating the marriage, the Pope claiming that it had not been consummated and should thus be dissolved. The Borgia family had grown so powerful that they no longer needed the Sforzas, and instead sought better alliances. Giovanni first refused, accusing Lucrezia of paternal and fraternal incest, but with the pressure from the rest of the Sforza family he finally agreed to sign confessions of impotence and documents of annulment before witnesses. Alfonso of Aragon married Lucrezia Borgia after the annulment, but the short marriage ended when he was murdered, supposedly by Lucrezia's brother Cesare. Lucrezia was appointed governor of Spoleto not long before her husband's death, and they had a child named Rodrigo of Aragon. Her third and last husband was Alfonso I d'Este, Duke of Ferrara. Lucrezia's reputation has taken a hit, with her many different marriages, murdered husband, annulment and the stain that her father and brother had brought upon her. Hopefully, with her marriage to the Duke, she can be known as a respectable and accomplished Renaissance duchess.
translation: 有些女人在家人的眼中唯一的价值便是嫁给一个有钱有影响力，往往比她们大出许多的男人从而建立联盟，获得影响力和钱财。卢克雷齐娅·波吉亚也是这种女人的一员，一生中被父亲教宗亚历山大六世许配给了三个不同的男人以获取强大的联盟与赞助。她的第一任丈夫是佩萨罗的领主，卡提诺拉伯爵乔伐尼·斯福尔扎。教宗之后声称这桩婚事因为没有圆房而应该被取缔，同时他也将卢克雷齐娅的嫁妆赠送给他以换取他的同意。波吉亚家族如今也将强大到不再需要斯福尔扎，所以他们便转而寻求新的盟友。乔伐尼一开始拒绝了离婚的请求并指控卢克雷齐娅与父亲和兄弟乱伦，但在斯福尔扎家族的压力下在证人前签署了性无能的证明与废除婚姻的文件。在离婚后阿拉贡的阿尔方索娶了卢克雷齐娅·波吉亚，但这一短命的婚姻在阿尔方索被杀——有说法称她的哥哥西撒雷就是凶手——后便终止了。在丈夫死前不久，卢克雷齐娅就被任命为斯波莱托的执政，他们也有了一个名为阿拉贡的罗德里格的孩子。她的第三任也是最后一人丈夫是费拉拉公爵阿尔方索一世·德斯特。卢克雷齐娅也因她的多次婚姻，被谋杀的丈夫，离婚以及她的哥哥和父亲给她带来的耻辱而臭名远扬。不过她仍有希望通过她与公爵的婚姻以一个受尊敬而有所成就的文艺复兴时期女公爵的身份闻名。

original: Her life hasn't been dull. Bring her to court!
translation: 她的人生可一点也不无聊。让她来宫廷！

original: Mayhaps we can learn a lesson from her life.
translation: 也许我们从她的人生中可以学到点什么

original: Nur Jahan
translation: 努尔·贾汗

original: The Empress of $COUNTRY$ and chief consort of Jahangir is a woman with piercing intelligence, charisma, a volatile temper and a sound common sense. Well versed in Arabic and Persian languages, art, literature, music and dance, Nur Jahan is the most powerful and influential women in the land. Greatly loved by her husband Emperor Jahangir, she contributes to culture, charity work, trade and the rule of the country, all made easier by her husband's affection for her and addiction to opium and alcohol. You will find her alongside Jahangir on the jharoka where they receive audiences, issues orders, administer the country and consults with ministers. It was easy for her to convince the Emperor to appoint her father Mirza Ghias Beg Prime Minister and her brother Asaf Khan as grand Wazir. With the marriages between her step-daughter Ladli to Jahangir's youngest son Shahryar and her niece Arjumand Banu Begum to Prince Khurram, she enforced her power in court and ensured continued connections to the throne. The courage and strength of body shown in her hunts of and kills of ferocious tigers has also proven vital when she has had to defend $COUNTRY$ from rebel uprisings, defense of the nations borders and family feuds. Most recently, she had to save Emperor Jahangir from the rebel leader Mahabat Khan. She led an army against the rebels mounted on a war elephant but had to surrender when her mount was hit. Mahabat Khan imprisoned her together with her husband, believing he had won a great victory. Nur Jahan proved him wrong, as she used her creativity and intellect to raise an army under his nose and escape with her husband.
translation: $COUNTRY$的皇后，贾汉吉尔的妻子是一位有着惊人的智慧，魅力，反复无常的脾气和完备的常识的女子。努尔·贾汗精通艺术，文学，音乐和舞蹈，能熟练使用阿拉伯语和波斯语，同时也是在这片土地上最强大而有影响力的女人。由于丈夫贾汉吉尔对她的深爱以及对鸦片和酒精的上瘾，她得以在文化，慈善，贸易和国家的管理上都有所贡献。你可以看到她与贾汉吉尔一同站在宫廷的阳台上接待访客，公布条令，管理国家，资讯顾问。她很轻松地便说服皇帝提拔她的父亲米尔扎·吉亚斯·贝格为总管，任命她的兄弟阿萨夫·汗味大维齐尔。通过她的继女拉德里与贾汉吉尔的幼子沙赫里亚尔以及她的侄女阿姬曼·芭奴·贝古姆与王子库拉姆之间的联姻，她增强了在宫廷中的力量并保证了与皇位间的联系。她在捕猎老虎时所表现出的勇气和健壮在之后抵抗$COUNTRY$的反叛与守卫国家的边境与家族领地时也表现出了极大的作用。就在最近，她从由马哈巴特·汗领导的叛军手中救出了丈夫。她骑着战象领导着部队抵抗叛军，但当她的坐骑被杀死后不得不投降。马哈巴特·汗将她与她的丈夫一同囚禁，自以为赢得了一场决定性的胜利。努尔·贾汗最终证明了他是错的——就在他的眼皮底下，她运用自己的创造力和智慧培养出了一支部队，并最终与丈夫一起逃离了监禁。

original: Intelligent and creative - just what we need!
translation: 智慧而有创意——正是我们所需要的！

original: She has convinced us - she will lead us!
translation: 她已经让我们信服了——就由她来领导我们！

original: Mary Read
translation: 玛丽·瑞德

original: The pirate sloop Revenge with Calico Jack Rackham as captain held a rum party when the pirate hunter Captain Jonathan Barnet disabled the ship with a volley of fire. The crew fled or were too drunk to fight, leaving Mary Read and Anne Bonny to fend off Barnet's troops. They were overcome and Rackham surrendered. They were all arrested and sentenced to hang for acts of piracy. The two women "Pleaded the Belly", which granted them a temporary mercy until their children were born. Mary Read told us of her life before she joined Rackham and Bonny, born an illegitimate child to the widow of a sea captain. Her mother disguised her as a boy and called her "Mark" to receive money from her dead brother's grandmother. When she became a teenager, she first found work as a foot-boy and then took employment on a ship. Still dressed as a man, she joined the British military and proved herself through battle. After falling in love with a Flemish soldier, they bought an inn with their military commission and gifts from friends in the army, who until her marriage had not realized that "Mark" was actually "Mary". Her husband died young and Read once again donned male dress and took employment as a soldier. But there were no wars, no battles to fight and no room for advancement. She quit the army and boarded a ship. It was taken by pirates and Read was forced to join them. After having taken the King's pardon and a commission to privateer, she joined the crew in mutiny and returned to piracy. Then she met the pirate captain John "Calico Jack" Rackham and his companion Anne Bonny.
translation: 就在海盗船复仇号的船长杰克“花斑”雷克汉姆正在举办一场朗姆酒排队时，他们的战舰在海盗猎手乔纳森·巴内特一轮齐射的攻击之下瞬间崩溃了。船员们不是四处逃窜便是醉得无法战斗，只剩下玛丽·瑞德和安妮·博尼来抵抗巴内特的部队。他们最终被打败，雷克汉姆投降了。他们全部被捕，并因海盗罪名而被判处绞刑。两位女子都以腹中的孩子求情，使得她们在孩子出生前能够暂时被赦免。玛丽·瑞德告诉了我们，在她加入雷克汉姆与博尼之前，她是一个船长遗孀的私生子。她的母亲把她打扮成男孩，叫他马克以获得她死去的哥哥的祖母的救济。在她成为一个少女后，她起初当过一段时间的仆人，之后便开始了海员的生涯。仍然身着男装的她加入了英国军队并在战斗中证明了自己的能力。在与一名佛拉芒士兵坠入爱河之后，他们用军饷和军中朋友——直到他们结婚时这些朋友们才知道“马克”其实是“玛丽”——的礼物买了一家小旅馆。他的丈夫年轻时就去世了，于是她便重新穿上男装并入伍，但当时没有战争，她也没有办法得到提拔。在退伍之后，她在船上被海盗劫持，并在强迫下成为了他们的一员。在受到了国王的赦免并被派往私掠船上服役后，她与船员一起哗变并重回了海盗的本行。之后她便碰到了海盗船船长杰克“花斑”雷克汉姆和他的同班安妮·博尼。

original: Too bad she will be hanged when her child is born.
translation: 真是可惜，她在诞下孩子后就不得不被绞死

original: Pardon her, she will become an admiral in our navy.
translation: 赦免她，让她成为我们的一位海军将领

original: Mumtaz Mahal
translation: 穆塔兹·马哈尔

original: Her name was Arjumand Banu Begum but her husband Shah Jahan, then Prince Khurram, gave her the title Mumtaz Mahal - Chosen One of the Palace - as he found her appearance and character so elect among all the women of the time. The love, intimacy and passion between them was so strong that Shah Jahan neglected his other two wives, only dutifully siring a child with each. Poets extolled her beauty, grace and compassion and the court historians documented the intimate and erotic relationship the couple enjoyed. Mumtaz Mahal never left Shah Jahan's side, traveling with him all over $COUNTRY$ and he trusted her so that he gave her the Muhr Uzah, his imperial seal. Though she had no aspirations to political power, she frequently intervened on behalf of the poor and destitute. Thirteen pregnancies had taken their toll on Mumtaz Mahal's body and her fourteenth, and last, took her life. Shah Jahan's grief over her death made him go into secluded mourning for a year, and when he reappeared, his hair had turned white. His back was bent, his face worn and it was only his eldest daugther Jahanara Begum who could bring him out of grief. The Taj Mahal was planned and designed by Shah Jahanar to become a suitable mausoleum and funerary garden for Mumtaz Mahal.
translation: 她的原名是阿姬曼·芭奴，但她的丈夫，库拉姆王子，未来的皇帝沙·贾汗在为她的美貌和性格所倾倒之后，赐予了她穆塔兹·马哈尔的称号，意为“宫中获选者”。他们之间的爱情，亲密与激情是那么的强，以至于沙·贾汗忽视了他的另外两个妻子，仅仅像是例行公事般与她们各生了一个孩子。诗人歌颂着她的美丽，优雅与怜悯之心，而宫廷历史学家们记下来他们之间充满亲密与情欲的关系。穆塔兹·马哈尔从未离开沙·贾汗的身边，与他一同在$COUNTRY$的各地游历。沙·贾汗十分信任她，以至于将他的皇家印章也赠与了她。虽然她没有任何的政治野心，但她仍然常常代表着穷苦的底层人民向她的丈夫提出建议。十三次身孕渐渐地摧残着她的身体，最终她没有能撑过第十四次。沙·贾汗因她的死而悲痛欲绝地悼念了整整一年，当他回来时，连头发都变得花白。他的脊背已经弯曲，面颊也饱经沧桑，只有他的长女贾哈那拉能够让他走出伤痛。他亲自为亡妻设计了泰姬陵，把它作为穆塔兹·马哈尔的陵墓。

original: Grief has struck the land, and we will forever remember Mumtaz Mahal.
translation: 这片大地沉浸于伤痛之中，我们永远也不会忘记穆塔兹·马哈尔

original: Make sure the Taj Mahal will be completed.
translation: 确保泰姬陵能够完工

original: Nanyehi
translation: 南耶希

original: The Beloved Woman of the Cherokee Nancy Ward or Nanyehi - One who goes about - sits in councils and makes decisions together with other Beloved Women and chiefs. She is known to us as a peace negotiator and ambassador who believes that we should live in peaceful coexistence with people from other countries and cultures. Her first husband was Kingfisher, who died in the battle of Taliwa. Nanyehi continued the fight and led her people to victory. Her bravery was awarded with the title of "Ghigau" which made her a member of the tribal council of chiefs. The Women's Council of Clan Representatives named her their leader and she became the ambassador and negotiator for her people. From Mrs. Lydia William Bean, who Nanyehi spared when the woman was captured after an attack on Bean's settlement, she was taught a new loom weaving technique after having nursed Bean back to health. The new weaving technique changed the roles of women in the Cherokee society. The men was left to do the planting, traditionally a woman's job, when the women took on the weaving. Two dairy cows were rescued from the destroyed settlement by Mrs. Bean, who then taught Nanyehi to raise the cattle and to eat dairy products. This proved helpful as the dairy could sustain the Cherokee when hunting was bad. Chief Attakullakulla taught Nanyehi the art of diplomacy and she was much surprised when she met European diplomats as there were no women negotiators among them. Their leader was appalled, such important work should not be given to a woman! Nanyehi replied: "You know that women are always looked upon as nothing; but we are your mothers, you are our sons. Our cry is all for peace, let it continue. This peace must last forever. Let your women's sons be ours, our sons be yours. Let your women hear our words.".
translation: 切罗基的“亲爱的女人”，原名南耶希——意为“四处走动的人”——英文名南西·瓦尔德，在会议上与其他的“亲爱的女人”和酋长们一同做出重要的决定。在我们眼中，她是一位爱好和平的谈判者和外交官，相信我们应该与不同国家，不同文化的人们和平相处。她的第一任丈夫名叫“翠鸟”，在塔里瓦战役中牺牲。南耶希继续战斗，并带领她的人民们获得了胜利。因为过人的勇气，她被授予了“基加奥”——即切罗基语中“亲爱的女人”——的称号并成为了部落会议的一员。部落女性代表会议推选她作为他们的领袖，外交官与谈判者。在部落对一处居民点的袭击中，他们抓获了莉迪亚·威廉·比恩，南耶希免了她一死。在将她身上的伤医好之后，莉迪亚教会了南耶希一种新的织机技巧。这一新的技巧改变了切罗基社会中女人的地位。男人得以取代女人种植庄稼，而女人则可以织布。莉迪亚在毁坏的居民点中救回了两头奶牛，并教会了南耶希如何圈养牛犊并食用乳制品。乳制品的出现使得切罗基部落在打猎不成功的时候也不会挨饿。酋长阿塔库拉库拉教会了南耶希外交的艺术，而当她看到了欧洲的谈判者时，她十分吃惊——其中居然没有一个女人。他们的领导者十分震惊，认为这样重要的工作不应该被交给女人。南耶希回答：“你知道女人总是被认为是没用的；但我们才是你们的母亲，你们是我们的儿子。我们所想要的只是和平，请让和平继续下去吧。和平必须永不被破坏。你们中女人的孩子便是我们的孩子，我们的孩子也是你们的孩子。让你们的女人们也听到我们的话吧。”

original: She has a point in that...
translation: 她说的不无道理。。。

original: This is something we must ponder.
translation: 我们得好好考虑一下

original: Vendela Skytte
translation: 温德拉·斯奎特

original:
Alas, the may flys does not live longer
They come and go with the sun.
When the evening wind blows by your ear,
In it is an image of my fates!
So sad around my grave does the sylphid go
and blow away my memory from time
VITALIS"
The statesman and noble Johan Skytte gave his daughters Vendela and Anna the same education as their brothers - the two studied theology, ethics, history, philology and geology. Vendela mastered Latin, French, German and Greek, and wrote letters in Latin to the learned Catharina Burea. Her parents admired the humanists Thomas More, Erasmus of Rotterdam and Juan Luis Vives, which led to the unusual educational level of Vendela. She married the noble colonel lieutenant Hans Kyle who was in service of the army of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and sometimes accompanied him in Germany. In $COUNTRY$, she held a salon and participated in intellectual debates, surrounding herself with scientists and artists. Her beauty and wit was admired and she was famed for her learning and academic abilities, rare qualities for her sex. "Sexus et sæculi miraculum" - The wonder of her time and her sex - Vendela was called by Georg Stiernhielm, something she proved at the Jesuit College in Braunsberg in East Prussia where she conducted a religious debate with learned Catholic males. She won the debate in perfect Latin, questioning the most sacred ideals of the Catholic religion.
translation:
“啊，浮游的生命是那么的短暂
日出日落一生便逝去
当晚风拂过你的耳旁
你便能听到我的宿命！
悲伤之中风精灵走过我的坟墓
将我的记忆永远带走
维塔利斯”
贵族政治家约翰·斯奎特让她的女儿温德拉和安娜受到了和她们的兄弟同样的教育，包括了神学，伦理，历史，哲学和地理。温德拉精通拉丁语，法语，德语和希腊语，并与博学的凯瑟琳娜·布里亚通信。她的父母崇敬人文主义者托马斯·摩尔，鹿特丹的爱拉斯谟斯和胡安·路易·比韦斯，这也是温德拉受到良好教育的原因。她嫁给了在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]中服役的贵族中将汉斯·凯尔，并时常来到德国陪伴他。在$COUNTRY$，她开办了一家沙龙，并与科学家与艺术家一起进行辩论。她的美丽和智慧被人称颂，也因为当时在女性身上少有的学习和学术能力而闻名。她被乔治·斯提尔汉姆称作“时代的奇迹，女性的奇迹”——这一点在她与饱读诗书的男天主教徒在东普鲁士布劳恩堡的耶稣会学院进行宗教辩论时就能看出。她通过质疑天主教信仰中最神圣的理念，用流利的拉丁语赢得了辩论。

original: Why haven't we invited her to court sooner?
translation: 为什么她还没有成为我们的顾问？

original: She is the ideal of a female academic!
translation: 她是所有女性学者的标杆！

original: Ahilyabai Holkar
translation: 阿喜亚拜·豪卡

original: A year after her father-in-law Malhar Rao Holkar and thirteen years after her husband Khanderao Holkar was killed in battle, Ahilyabai has petitioned the Peshwa to become queen and ruler of $COUNTRY$. She is already trained in administrative and military matters by Malhar Rao who strongly believes her to become a capable ruler. The army is enthusiastic over her leadership, as Ahilyabai has led them in person on her favorite elephant armed with bows and quivers of arrows. We have seen what she has accomplished when her husband and father-in-law were alive, she has led armies into battle, is a patron of temples, has developed small villages into prosperous and beautiful cities, built forts and roads and made our capital into the scene of literary, musical, artistic and industrial enterprise.
translation: 在阿喜亚拜的继父马尔哈尔·拉奥·霍尔卡战死一年，她的丈夫汗德拉奥·豪卡战死十三年后，阿喜亚拜向佩什瓦——马拉地帝国的总管一职——申请成为$COUNTRY$的女王和统治者。马尔哈尔·拉奥坚定地相信她有成为一位伟大统治者的能力，并在生前教授了她如何处理行政事项与军事问题。军队对她的掌权充满了热情，因为阿喜亚拜在之前就亲自骑着最爱的战象，带着弓和箭筒带领他们叱咤疆场。我们已经看到了在她继父与丈夫在世时阿喜亚拜所完成的功绩：在战争中统帅着部队，赞助寺庙，将小村庄发展成为繁荣而美丽的城市，建设要塞和道路，并把我们的首都塑造成了文学，音乐，艺术和工业的中心。

original: No, tell her we'll hire her as advisor instead.
translation: 不，告诉她我们会聘请她做顾问

original: Her military prowess will make her an excellent general.
translation: 她在军事上的能力会让她成为一位称职的将军

original: She is truly a magnificent woman, and will be an able ruler and a great queen.
translation: 她是一位真正伟大的女人，她将会是一位贤能的统治者和一个受人敬畏的女王

original: Jahanzeb Banu Begum
translation: 扎汗则布·巴努·贝古姆

original: The two roles Jahanzeb Banu Begum, the wife of Prince Muhammad Azam, has in the princely household are of diplomatic and military nature. She is a beautiful, cultured and courageous woman whose great skill at maintaining a household of harmony has been tested many times. She makes sure a strong spirit of camaraderie and shared struggles is cultivated among the members of the household. If it had not been for her, Mir Hedayatullah, the chief huntsman and koka, would have never been forgiven by Prince Muhammad Azam when they had exchanged bitter words after a spat. Azam trusted her and confided in her, as she was his favorite wife and vastly loved by him. This helped when Jahanzeb had to persuade him to let Mir Hedayatullah rejoin the household. The relationship between their son Prince Bidar Bakht and Azam is often poisoned due to imperial favor, and it is up to Jahanzeb to soothe the relation and make sure they got along. Jahanzeb led her husband's troops when he had to move ahead upon summons from his father, and she mounted her elephant three years later to encourage a lagging [Root.GetAdjective] counterattack on the enemy. It was then she made a promise to commit suicide if the [Root.GetAdjective] Army was overrun. Thankfully, that did not happen.
translation: 穆罕默德·阿扎姆王子的妻子扎汗则布·巴努·贝古姆于王子的家族中在军事和外交两个方面都扮演着重要的角色。她是一位美丽，有教养而勇敢的女人，她在维持家族和睦上的能力以及被数次考研过了。她确保在家族成员之间培养出一种强大的，同甘共苦的情谊。如果没有她，穆罕默德·阿萨姆王子恐怕在一次争吵之后永远也无法原谅猎人总管米尔·黑达亚图拉。阿萨姆十分信任她，因为她是阿萨姆最喜欢的一个妻子。这一点在她说服阿萨姆让米尔·黑达亚图拉回到家族时起到了很大的作用。他们的儿子，比达尔·巴克特王子与阿萨姆之间的关系常常因皇宫中的事宜受到破坏，而扎汗则布的工作就是要缓解他们之间的关系并让他们友好相处。当有一次她的丈夫因为父亲的传唤而离开时，她就曾统帅丈夫的部队作战。三年之后，她又骑上了她的战象，准备带领着[Root.GetAdjective]对敌人展开一场已经推迟了的反击。她当时保证，一旦[Root.GetAdjective]的军队败北，她就将自杀。幸运的是，这种情况没有发生。

original: She should be at court, acting as advisor!
translation: 她应该来到宫廷，做一个顾问！

original: Not only is she beautiful, she knows how to lead an army!
translation: 她不但那么美丽，她还知道如何统帅一支军队！

original: Ching Shih
translation: 郑氏

original: The sly and shrewd pirate queen Ching Shih - "The Terror of South China" as she was called - managed to negotiate that she would keep all her loot ill-begotten from piracy. $COUNTRY$ has found it impossible to beat her, with sixty-three ships lost in the latest attacks, so amnesty was offered to all pirates and Ching Shih took advantage of this. Ending her career a wealthy woman, she retired with her husband Chang Pao. There are those who say that her fleet consisted of over 300 junks manned by 20,000-40,000 pirates, while others claim that she had 1,800 ships with a crew of about 80,000 men, women, and even children. Ching Shih used to be a prostitute until she was captured by pirates and married Jihng Yat, one of the most notorious pirates before she took control of his fleet after his death. The Red Flag Fleet was a coalition of several competing Cantonese pirate fleets gathered by Jihng Yat using military assertion and his reputation. He died in Vietnam and Ching Shih maneuvered her way into his leadership position by cultivating personal relationships. She managed to make herself essential to the captains and united the fleet by issuing a code of laws. The first law was that anyone giving their own orders or disobeying those of a superior were beheaded immediately. The second law forbade theft from the public fund or any villagers that supplied the pirates. The third law was that all goods taken as booty had to be presented and registered by a purser and then distributed by the fleet leader. 20 percent was given to the original seizer and the rest was placed in the public fund. The fourth law was that all actual money was to be turned over to the squadron leader and used to purchase supplies for unsuccessful ships. The fleet robbed towns, markets and villages from Macau to Canton, even establishing hegemony over many coastal villages, in some cases imposing levies and taxes on settlements.
translation: 狡猾而精明的海盗女王，被称作“南中国死神”的郑一嫂在经过谈判后成功保留了她在海上劫掠而来的所有财宝。在上一次战斗中损失了63艘舰船之后，$COUNTRY$意识到他们根本无法击败她，因此对所有海盗进行了大赦，而郑一嫂把握住了这个机会，和她的丈夫张保仔一起结束了海盗生涯，过上了富有的生活。有些人说她的舰队包括了300多艘帆船和2万到4万个海盗，而其他人说她有1800艘船，有约8万个男人，女人甚至是儿童成员。郑一嫂曾是一名妓女，在被海盗劫走后嫁给了整个中国最臭名昭著的海盗之一的郑一，并在他死后成功掌控了整个船队。红旗帮是郑一运用他的名声与军事管理的方法统一起来的，活跃于广东地区的许多海盗船队。郑一死在了越南，而郑一嫂通过培养的许多人脉成功登上了掌权的位置。她使得自己对船长们必不可少，并通过一系列的规章制度将船队联合在了一起。第一条是，所有私自下命令或者违抗上级命令的人都要立即被砍头。第二条禁止抢劫储备金和资助海盗的村民。第三条是所有抢来的赃物都需要必须要交给船上的事务长登记，并由船队领导者分发。两成的钱会被退还给物品原先的抢夺者，剩下的钱则会被收集作储备金。第四条规定所有现金都应被上交给队长，并把它们分配给那些抢劫不成功的船。舰队抢劫过的城镇，市场的村庄遍布着澳门到广东的海岸，甚至在许多沿岸村庄建立了霸权，强制他们缴纳税收。

original: We could learn much from her.
translation: 我们可以在她身上学到许多

original: Force her out of retirement and give her charge over a fleet.
translation: 强迫她放弃平民生活并任命她为海军将领

original: Mentewab
translation: 门特瓦布

original: The former Empress of $COUNTRY$ and consort of Emperor Bakaffa has suggested that she will co-rule our country together with her grandson Iyoas until he comes of age. Berhan Mogasa or "Glorifier of Light", as Mentewab is also called, is descended from emperors who reigned two centuries earlier and has already co-ruled once before. This has led to conflict between her and her son's widow Wubit who wishes to preside at her son's court. Mentewab has summoned her Qwaran relatives and their forces for support, while Wubit has summoned her Oromo relatives and their considerable forces. We have already seen what Mentewab has done for our country, the buildings she has built such as the castle, the large banqueting hall and a church dedicated to the Virgin Mary. She possess a great deal of influence at court and has shown greater administrative and diplomatic skill than her son's widow.
translation: $COUNTRY$的前任皇后，巴卡法皇帝的妻子提出建议，称她愿意与孙子伊奥斯一起统治帝国，直到伊奥斯成年。被称作“赞美之光”的门特瓦布是两个多世纪前的皇帝的后代，而且之前已经共同统治过一次。这导致了她与想要自己主持宫廷的儿媳乌比特之间的冲突。门特瓦布召集了她的澳拉人亲戚和部队，而乌比特召集了她的奥罗莫人亲戚和他们的部队。我们已经看到了门特瓦布为国家所作出的贡献，她所建造的城堡，大型宴会厅和献给圣母玛利亚的教堂。她在宫廷中有强大的影响力，而且相比她的儿媳表现出了更强的管理和外交能力。

original: Dismiss her notions and install her as advisor instead.
translation: 驳回她的请求，让她做一个顾问

original: Make her co-ruler again.
translation: 再次让她成为统治者。

original: Safiye Sultan
translation: 索菲亚苏丹

original: The first and only concubine to Murad III for a long time became slightly bitter when her husband took more concubines and sired twenty more sons and twenty-seven daughters. She soon forgot her bitterness and Safiye Sultan earned the gratitude of the Sultan by procuring more concubines for him. Murad valued her and consulted with her on political matters. Their only son Mehmed became sultan after Murad's death and Safiye became Valide Sultan - mother sultan, a title with much power. She steered [Root.GetAdjective] politics together with Gazanfer Aga, chief of the white eunuchs and head of the enderun - the imperial inner palace. During her son's military campaigns Safiye was left in charge of the treasury and managed to persuade her son to follow her advice in many political matters. Safiye was described by a Venetian ambassador as "a woman of her word, trustworthy, and I call say that in her alone have I found truth in Constantinople; therefore it will always benefit Your Serenity to promote her gratitude.".
translation: 作为穆拉德三世的第一位和唯一一位长期的情妇，她在丈夫迎娶了更多情妇并产下了20个儿子和27个女儿时也显得有一丝不满。不过莎菲耶苏丹不久便忘记了这丝不满，并通过为苏丹取得更多的情妇使得他表示感谢。穆拉德十分珍视她，并向他咨询政治上的问题。他们的独子穆罕默德在穆拉德死后成为了苏丹，而莎菲耶则成为了苏丹皇太后，一个有着相当权力的头衔。她与白人宦官总长和皇家内宫总管加藏菲·阿加一同管理着[Root.GetAdjective]的政坛。在她的儿子外出征战时，莎菲耶被留下掌管财政，同时也成功地说服穆罕默德在政治问题上听从她的意见。一位威尼斯商人是这样描述莎菲耶的“一个守信，同时也值得信任的女人，光是她一个人我就能够相信君士坦丁堡；因此大人您总是能在促进她的感激之情时得到好处。”

original: She will advise us on monetary matters.
translation: 她将在经济方面给我们建议

original: Her diplomatic skill will come in use as an advisor.
translation: 我们能用得上她的外交技能

original: Angelica Kauffman
translation: 安杰丽卡·考夫曼

original: The history painter Angelica Kauffman is visiting $COUNTRY$ once again, under the patronage of her dear friend Lady Wentworth. Speaker of several languages, including English, French, Italian and German, she is an incessant reader, a talented musician but she is above all a great painter who have become a notability in all the countries she has visited. The British royal family has shown her great favor but Sir Joshua Reynolds is Angelica's greatest friend. It was he that made sure that she was among the signatories to the petition to the king for the establishment of the Royal Academy which was founded not long after. Angelica is an annual exhibitor with the Royal Academy and her painting "Leonardo expiring in the Arms of Francis the First" has received much praise. There are few women who identifies themselves as history painters, which is considered the most elite and lucrative category in academic painting, but Angelica Kauffman is one of them.
translation: 在她的好朋友温特沃斯女士的赞助下，历史画家安杰丽卡·考夫曼又一次来到了$COUNTRY$。她精通包括英语，法语，意大利语和德语在内的许多语言，是一位热情的读者，一位有天赋的音乐家，更是一位伟大的画家，能够在所有她停留过的国家里都成为名人。英国皇族帮了她许多忙，但约书亚·雷诺兹爵士才是她最好的朋友。他让安杰丽卡成为了向国王提出建立皇家学院的请愿书的签署人之一。而在不久后皇家学院便成功成立了。她每年都会来到学院中展出她的画作，其中《莱昂纳多参观弗朗西斯一世的军队》一作收到了尤其多的赞赏。很少有女性选择历史画家——在学院派绘画中最优秀而最有利可图的一类——作为职业，但安杰丽卡·考夫曼就是她们中的一员。

original: A remarkable skilled woman, who we absolutely need.
translation: 这是个非凡的有能力的女人，我们绝对需要她。

original: Her paintings are truly amazing.
translation: 她的画作实在是令人惊叹

original: Elizaveta of Russia
translation: 俄罗斯的伊丽莎白

original: Though her education had been imperfect and desultory, Elizaveta is a bright, vivacious and beautiful woman who speaks Italian, German and French fluently. This is worth noting, as her coup to take the [Root.GetAdjective] throne will be successful if we agree to let her rule. Anna Leopoldovna's regency for her infant Ivan VI has been marked by high taxes and economic problems, which has furthered Elizaveta's cause. The Russian guards regiments supports her and could be the determining force that compels us to anoint her ruler. She has promised to never sign death sentences but is not adverse to spill blood. With the words, "Who do you want to serve? Me, the natural sovereign, or those who have stolen my inheritance?" the Preobrazhensky Regiment was convinced to join her. Hopefully she has inherited her father's genius for government, Elizaveta has already shown signs of keen judgment and diplomatic tact that remains us of Peter the Great. Aleksey Bestuzhev-Ryumin is rumored to become her new vice chancellor, a formidable diplomat, and she has expressed her dissatisfaction with the cabinet council system, wishing to reconstitute the senate as it had been under Peter the Great, with the chiefs of the departments of state attending. Under her rule, perhaps we can establish the University of Moscow and the Imperial Academy of Arts?
translation: 尽管伊丽莎白所受到的教育并不完美而且断断续续，她仍不失为一个聪明，活泼而美丽，同时又精通意大利语，德语和法语的女子。这一点值得一提，因为如果我们同意让她上台，那么她夺取[Root.GetAdjective]王位的政变就将成功。年幼的伊凡六世在安娜·列奥波多夫娜的摄政下，国家出现了包括高税收在内的诸多经济问题，这也促进了伊丽莎白的影响俄罗斯禁卫部队支持着她，这一强大的力量也可能迫使我们让她登上王位。虽然她保证不会签署死刑判决，但是这并不代表流血是不利的。她只用了一句话“你们想要服侍谁？是我，名正言顺的君主，还是那些抢走我的继承权的人？”就让普列奥布拉任斯基军团向她俯首称臣。在登上王位前，伊丽莎白便表现出了敏锐的判断力与外交上的分寸，使我们想起了她的父亲彼得大帝。有传言称令人敬畏的外交家阿列克谢·别斯图热夫-鲁明将会成为她的新一任副总理，同时她也表达了对现行的内阁议会系统的不满，希望让议会制度重回彼得大帝时期的形式，让国家各部的部长参与。在她的统治之下，也许我们能够建立莫斯科大学和皇家艺术学院？

original: Intervene and placate her with a place as advisor at the court.
translation: 进行干涉，让她成为宫廷的一名顾问

original: We will let her rule $COUNTRY$.
translation: 我们会让她领导$COUNTRY$

original: Anna of Russia
translation: 俄罗斯的安娜

original: The obstinacy and cruelty of Anna of Russia can be explained by her upbringing, she was raised for the nunnery and grew up confined to a royal cult of domesticity which did not allow for her personality to develop properly. The [Root.GetAdjective] Supreme Privy Council has decided to publicly support her as our new ruler, hoping that she will become a figurehead or at least malleable enough to allow them to rule through her. A set of laws that will limit her powers is being drafted, prohibiting Anna to start war, call for peace, create new taxes, or promote individuals to high ranks. Nor will she be able to punish nobility without trial, grant estates or villages, promote anyone to court office, and she will not be able to spend the revenue generated by the state. Eight hundred noblemen have heard the rumors of Anna's possible ascent to the throne and have signed a petition that will urge her to continue to rule $COUNTRY$ in an autocratic style and to continue to carry out Peter the Great's political, social, and economic advances. We doubt that Anna will become a figurehead, nor will she be easy to control. She was brought to the [Root.GetAdjective] court early in life, making her well prepared to handle political structure. With the favor of the Imperial guards and the lesser nobility, Anna will get her way.
translation: 安娜从小便被培养为修女，成长也被限制在一个宗教气息浓重的皇家家庭之中，使得她的性格没有得到正常的发展，或许能够解释她在成年后的偏执与残暴。[Root.GetAdjective]最高枢密院已经决定要公开地支持她成为我们新一任的统治者，希望她能够成为一个傀儡，或者至少让枢密院能够在她背后操控政坛。一系列限制她权利的法律已经开始起草，其中包括禁止安娜发动战争，提议和平，添加新税或者提拔高官。她也不能不经过审判就惩罚贵族，赐予庄园或者村庄，提拔任何人道宫廷，同时她也不能动用国库内的收入。有800名贵族已经听说了安娜即将登上王位的传闻，并联名请愿她用独裁的方式统治$COUNTRY$，并执行彼得大帝的政治，社会和经济改革。安娜不太可能是一个容易掌控的人，更不用说傀儡。她在早年便被带入了[Root.GetAdjective]的宫廷，使得她对政治系统十分熟悉。有着禁卫部队和少数贵族的青睐，安娜或许能够用自己的方式统治这个国家。

original: We cannot trust her willpower, but we can trust her intellect.
translation: 我们无法信任她的意志，但我们可以信任她的智慧

original: Support her and have her installed on the throne.
translation: 支持她，让她登上王位

original: Nurbanu Sultan
translation: 努尔巴努苏丹

original: During the reign of Sultan Selim II, Nurbanu Sultan was his favorite consort and wife. Born in Venice and named Rachel Olivia de Nasi, she was abducted and taken to Prince Selim's royal harem where she was renamed Afife Nurbanu Sultan. Her beauty and intelligence, and the fact that she was the mother of the heir-apparent, made her husband ask her for advice as he respected her good judgement in various subjects. When her husband died, her son Murad was away, serving as Governor. Nurbanu realized that his abscence had created the prefect opportunity for someone else to seize the throne, with the Sultan dead and his son away from the capital. Fortunately for her and her son, Selim II had died in the harem and as security and privacy was strict, no one knew of his death. She kept it a secret, hid the body in an icebox and sent words to her son to return to the capital. Murad arrived twelve days later and with the death of Selim made public, their son became Sultan and Nurbanu became Queen Mother or Valide Sultan. Nurbanu is now a formidable figure with great power and far-reaching influence. Her management of the government is very effective and her diplomatic skills impressive.
translation: 在苏丹塞利姆二世的统治时期，努尔巴努苏丹是她最宠爱的一个妻子。出生在威尼斯，原名蕾切尔·奥利维亚·德·纳西的她在被绑架盗塞利姆王子的后宫后被改名阿费夫·努尔巴努苏丹。由于她的美貌与智慧，以及她的孩子以及被确定为继承人这一事实，塞利姆常常向她咨询国事，并在许多问题上都尊重了她敏锐的判断。在她丈夫去世时，她的儿子穆拉德正在外地担任地方执政。努尔巴努认识到他的缺席和老苏丹的去世创造了夺取皇位的绝佳机会。幸运的是，塞利姆二世是在后宫中去世的，而因为后宫严格护卫，没有人知道皇帝已经死了。她将此事保密，将尸体藏在冰盒中并召唤她的儿子回到首都。穆拉德在12天后赶到，而在塞利姆的死讯被公开后，穆拉德成为了苏丹，而努尔巴努就成为了苏丹皇太后。现在的努尔巴努是一个拥有着强大力量和影响力的角色。她对政府的管理十分有效，她的外交技巧也令人惊叹。

original: Besides being Valide Sultan, she will be awarded with a position as advisor.
translation: 除了苏丹皇太后，她还将成为我们的顾问

original: We would have her rule $COUNTRY$.
translation: 我们会让她统治$COUNTRY$

original: Heo Nanseolheon
translation: 许兰雪轩

original: Heo Yeop, the father of the poet Heo Nanseolheon, is a conservative official with Confucian beliefs such as namjon-yubi - men above, women below. Ignoring her budding talent and curiosity, he left it to her brother Heo Pong to introduce her to literature. The "Inscriptions on the Ridge Pole of the White Jade Pavilion in the Kwanghan Palace" was written by her when she was only eight years old, earning her the epithet "Immortal Maiden" as it was recognized as a work of poetic genius. Heo Pong introduced her to Chinese writing such as the Confucian Five Classics when she showed a natural talent for hanum verse. Forced into exile because of his political leanings, Heo Pong left her further education in the hands of their younger brother Heo Gyun. He was a gifted poet who studied under a specialist of Tang poetry, Yi Tal, who took it upon him to share Tang Poetry with Nanseolheon. Tang poetry has influenced her work, shown in the naturalism of her poetry. When Nanseolheon married Kim Seongnip her poetry started to lament the plight and sufferings of married women. Her early literature employed folklore and natural imagery, common to Tang tradition, but now her poetry is weighted down with an emotive language.
translation: 许相，诗人许兰雪轩的父亲，是一位保守的官员，遵循着例如“男尊女卑”的儒家思想。当她的天赋和好奇心被他所忽视之后，她的哥哥许篈把她介绍进了文学界。她在八岁时就写出了《广寒殿玉楼上梁文》一诗，被称作“不朽少女”。许篈在她表现出对汉字词句自然的天赋后，她便被许篈介绍接触例如四书五经等的汉字作品。许篈因政治原因遭到了流放，不得不把教育她的人物交给了弟弟许筠。他是一位有天赋的诗人，而当时正在教育他的一位唐诗专家也来与许兰雪轩交流唐诗。唐诗深深地影响了她的作品，从她诗中的自然主义便能看出。在她嫁给金诚立后，她的诗中开始表达已婚女子的苦难。她的早期作品像唐诗一样常常运用民俗传说和自然景象，而现在她的诗歌往往包含许多抒情的语句。

original: Save her from unhappy marriage and make her an advisor.
translation: 将她从这段婚姻中解脱出来，任命她为顾问

original: We can do nothing but appreciate her poems.
translation: 除了欣赏她的诗之外，我们什么也做不了

original: Mariam-uz-Zamani
translation: 马里昂-乌兹-扎马尼

original: The birth of their son made Rajkumari Heer Kunwari's husband, Emperor Akbar, give her the title Mariam-uz-Zamani - Mary of the Age - and he named the boy Salim, to acknowledge the holy man who had promised him three sons. Though she was his third wife, as mother of the heir-apparent Mariam-uz-Zamani took precedence over Akbar's other wives. She is a hindu and her marriage to Akbar led him to look more favorable on Hinduism and his Hindu subjects. It also gave Akbar the powerful support of her family throughout his reign, and with the marriage to a Hindu Rajput princess he signaled that he would be the Badshah of his whole people, no matter their religion. Few women in court has ever been granted the right to issue farman, official documents which are usually the exclusive privilege of the emperor, but Akbar trusted Mariam-uz-Zamani enough to grant her that privilege. She used her title Wali Nimat Begam - the Gift of God - when she issued farmans. With her wealth amassed from her international trade in spices, silk and many other wares, she builds gardens, wells, and mosques. Mariam-uz-Zamani's private fortune dwarf many a European king and she is known to be an adventurous trader and the most prodigious trader at court. She held the Mansab rank of 12,00, the only woman to do so. Her ships carries pilgrims to and from Mecca, and the outrage at the court when the Rahimi, known as the great pilgrim ship, was seized by European soldiers and they officially refused to return the ship and its 600 passengers could be heard all the way to the holy city. It was released, and its passenger with it, but she bears a grudge against those who hindered the pilgrims to reach Mecca.
translation: 在拉杰昆马里·希尔·昆瓦里为丈夫阿克巴皇帝生下了一个儿子时，皇帝高兴至极，授予了她马里昂-乌兹-扎马尼——波斯语中的“时代的玛丽”——的称号，并将这个男孩命名为萨利姆以纪念那位保证他会有三个儿子的圣人。虽然马里昂-乌兹-扎马尼是她的第三个妻子，但作为继承人的母亲，她在阿克巴其他的妻子中都有优先权。她是一名印度教徒，并成功地让阿克巴对印度教以及那些信奉印度教的臣子们的态度有了改观，也让阿克巴在统治期间获得了马里昂-乌兹-扎马尼强大家族的支持。这桩与信奉印度教徒的拉杰普特公主的婚事也让人们知道了无论他们信奉什么宗教，阿克巴都是他们的巴德沙阿。很少有宫廷中女子能获得签署法曼——一般仅由皇帝亲自签署的官方文件——的特权，但是阿克巴十分信任马里昂-乌兹-扎马尼，以至于他将这一权利也赐予了她。她在签署法曼时使用她个人的头衔瓦利·尼马特·贝加姆——神的礼物。通过她在香料，丝绸和其他贸易中所积累的大量资金，她建造了许多花园，井和清真寺。马里昂-乌兹-扎马尼的个人财产让许多欧洲的国外都自感惭愧，同时她也以一个贸易时的大胆和贸易的惊人规模而闻名。她拥有1200名骑兵，是唯一一个有这样数量不对的女人。她用自己的船为往返麦加的朝圣者提供交通工具，而在当她得知她的一艘船，拉西尼号，载着600名朝圣者被欧洲部队扣押并拒绝释放后，她的怒吼在整个圣城都能被听到。虽然最终这艘船和它的乘客们都被释放了，但是她对那些妨碍向麦加朝圣的欧洲人的怨恨却未曾消退。

original: Let her be in charge of the treasury, she has proven herself capable of handling money.
translation: 让她负责国库，她已经证明了自己管理财产的能力

original: Her astute sense of business will be beneficent for our trade as well.
translation: 她在商业上的敏锐侦查力会对我们的贸易有利

original: Franciszka Urszula Radziwillowa
translation: 弗朗西斯卡·乌苏拉·拉齐维洛娃

original: The brilliant dramatist and writer Franciszka Urszula Radziwillowa has written sixteen plays for her court theater with subjects and characters taken from medieval dramas, Ancient mythology, Arab and Persian humoresques and folklore. We call her the first [Root.GetAdjective] playwright and it is thanks to her szlachta family of Janusz Antoni Wisniowiecki and the education she received.
translation: 伟大的戏剧家和作家弗朗西斯卡·乌苏拉·拉齐维洛娃为她的宫廷剧院写了16部喜剧，内容涵盖了中世纪，古代传说，阿拉伯和波斯的谐谑曲以及民俗传说。我们称她为 [Root.GetAdjective]的第一位剧作家，而她的成就也得归功于她所在的雅努什·安东尼·维什尼维斯基的贵族家庭以及她所受到的良好教育。

original: A true artist, an advisor we need.
translation: 一个真正的艺术家，一个我们需要的顾问

original: We will encourage more people like her, to contribute to our culture.
translation: 我们会鼓励更多人像她一样为自己的文化做出贡献

original: Aphra Behn
translation: 埃弗拉·贝恩

original: The writer and spy Aphra Behn works hard to seek out regicides that may be plotting against the new regime. She are trying to turn Puritans into double-agents for the monarchy and uses her pen to attack Parliamentary enemies of our ruler.
translation: 作家和间谍埃弗拉·贝恩努力地寻找着那些可能策划反抗新政权的叛乱分子。她尝试将清教徒变成君王的双面间谍，并用她手中的笔来攻击我们的统治者在议会中的敌人。

original: Eliza Lucas
translation: 艾莉萨·卢卡斯

original: She is a plantation owner who experiments with a number of different seed in an effort to diversify the South Carolina farming industry.
translation: 作为一位种植园主，她有关许多不同种子的实验大大促进了南卡罗来纳农业的多样化。

original: Juana Ines de la Cruz
translation: 胡安娜·伊涅斯·德·拉·克鲁斯

original: She is a self-taught scholar and poet of the Baroque school, and Hieronymite nun of New Spain, known in her lifetime as "The Tenth Muse".
translation: 她是巴洛克学校中的一名自学成才的诗人和学者，新西班牙的一位哲罗姆派修女，在生前也被称作“第十个缪斯”。

original: Jane Austen
translation: 简·奥斯汀

original: Both pleasure readers and scholars devour the books of Jane Austen, "Sense and Sensibility", "Pride and Prejudice", "Mansfield Park" and "Emma", who all contain realism, biting irony and great plots.
translation: 无论是休闲读者还是学者都热爱着简·奥斯汀的作品：《理智与情感》，《傲慢与偏见》，《曼斯菲尔德庄园》和《爱玛》，这些杰作都充满了现实主义，尖利的风刺以及优秀的剧情。

original: Louise of Mecklenburg-Strelitz
translation: 梅克伦堡-施特里茨的露易丝

original: The Soul of National Virtue" she is called, and people speak highly of Louise's angelic goodness and political insights.
translation: 她被称作「民族美德之魂」，人们常常赞叹露易丝那天使般的善良和政治上的远见。

original: Abigail Adams
translation: 艾碧该·亚当斯

original: The wife of USA's second President Abigail Adams is an erudite lady with an open mind. Her great intellect makes her husband often seek her advice on political matters.
translation: 美国第二任总统的妻子艾碧该·亚当斯是一位满腹经纶，思想开明的女子。她的丈夫常常会因她的智慧而向她咨询政治上的问题。

original: Meera Bai
translation: 米拉·拜

original: The devotee of Krishna Meera Bai is a pious woman who dances and sings to spread the words of her god and great love.
translation: 作为黑天的忠实拥护者，米拉·拜是一名虔诚的女子，尝尝为了表达她对神的爱戴而舞蹈，歌唱。

original: Ho Xuan Huong
translation: 胡春香

original: Subtle and witty poems about places, people and politics are the work of Ho Xuan Huong, a teacher and poet.
translation: 作为一位教师和诗人，胡春香隐晦而幽默的诗篇描写了当地的景色，人物和政治。

original: Kateri Tekakwitha
translation: 凯瑟琳·提卡圭塔

original: At age nineteen, Kateri Tekakwitha converted to Roman Catholicism and lived in a Christian community until she died. Her face, marred by smallpox, is said to have cleared and become beautiful after death.
translation: 在19岁时，凯瑟琳·提卡圭塔皈依了罗马天主教，直到去世为止一直在一个天主教社区居住。她那饱受天花璀璨的面容据称在死后重新长好，并露出了她真实的美貌。

original: Maria Sibylla Merian
translation: 玛利亚·西碧拉·梅里安

original: The work "Metamorphosis insectorum Surinamensium" about the metamorphosis of the butterfly is the masterpiece of the naturalist and scientific illustrator Maria Sibylla Merian.
translation: 有关蝴蝶变态现象的作品《苏里南昆虫变态图谱》是博物学家和科学插画家玛利亚·西碧拉·梅里安的杰作。

original: Kenau Simonsdochter Hasselaer
translation: 克瑙·西蒙斯多赫特·哈舍拉尔

original: The heroine of a siege by the Spanish was the wood merchant Kenau Simonsdochter Hasselaer who encouraged the townspeople to keep fighting and rebuild the city walls.
translation: 木材商人克瑙·西蒙斯多赫特·哈舍拉尔是一位在西班牙围城中鼓励市民抵抗并帮助重建城墙的女英雄。

original: Elena Cornaro Piscopia
translation: 艾莲娜·科纳罗·皮斯科皮亚

original: The first woman to receive a doctoral degree from a university Elena Cornaro Piscopia spoke in classical Latin during a full hour, explaining random passages from the works of Aristotle.
translation: 作为第一位在大学取得博士学位的女子，艾莲娜·科纳罗·皮斯科皮亚用古典拉丁语对亚里士多德作品的阐述持续了整整一个小时。

original: Yekaterina Romanovna Vorontsova-Dashkova
translation: 叶卡捷琳娜·罗曼诺芙娜·沃伦佐娃-达什科娃

original: The Director of the Imperial Academy of Arts and Sciences Yekaterina Romanovna Vorontsova-Dashkova has managed to restore the institution to its fromer prominence and intellectual respectability.
translation: 皇家艺术科学院的主任叶卡捷琳娜·罗曼诺芙娜·沃伦佐娃-达什科娃成功地让这所学院恢复了它过去的荣光与学术的权威。

original: Marie Crous
translation: 玛丽·克鲁斯

original: She introduced the decimal system to France and is an accomplished writer and teacher at Charlotte-Rose de Caumont La Force.
translation: 她将十进制系统引入了法国，同时也是夏洛特-罗斯·德·古蒙德·拉弗尔斯的一位有名的作家和教师。

original: Ohatsu
translation: 阿初

original: A shrewd negotiator and diplomat, Ohatsu used her skills to serve as a conduit between the rivals and acted as a liaison during the Sengoku period.
translation: 作为一个精明的谈判家和外交家，阿初在战国时代运用她高超的技巧在一队宿敌间架起了沟通的桥梁。

original: Wang Zhenyi
translation: 王贞仪

original: Many articles about everything from astronomy to mathematics has been written by Wang Zhenyi such as "The Explanation of a Solar Eclipse" and "The Musts of Calculation".
translation: 从天文学到数学，王贞仪的文章包括了科学的许多方面，例如《月食解》和《筹算易知》。

original: Suriyothai
translation: 素里育泰

original: The brave Queen Suriyothai died when she saved her husband from death by charging her elephant towards the enemy commander who sought to kill him.
translation: 勇敢的王后素里育泰通过牺牲自己而驾着战象冲向准备杀死国王的敌军指挥官的行动拯救了他的性命。

original: Olympe de Gouges
translation: 奥兰普·德古热

original: Challenging the inequality in the world with her "Declaration of the Rights of Woman and the Female Citizen", it is not the first time Olympe de Gouges has fought injustices with well-written articles.
translation: 通过发表《女权宣言》挑战世界上的两性不平等已经不是第一次奥兰普·德古热通过优美的文章来与不公平作斗争了。

original: Izumo no Okuni
translation: 阿国

original: The creator of Kabuki, the gaudy, musical, noisy and colorful performances, Izumo no Okuni, was originally a miko, a priestess who travels to various places to perform sacred songs and dances to get alms for the reparation of her shrine.
translation: 花哨而充满音乐，吵闹而有色彩缤纷的歌舞伎表演的创造者阿国原先是一名旅行各地，通过表演舞蹈和唱歌来为她所在的神社募集修缮费的巫女。

original: Martha Washington
translation: 玛莎·华盛顿

original: The first First Lady of the United States of America Martha Washington was at first opposed to George Washington agreeing to become President but soon reconciled and hosted many affairs of state once he assumed office.
translation: 美国第一位第一夫人玛莎·华盛顿一开始是反对华盛顿担任总统的。不过她很快就妥协了并在华盛顿就职后主办了许多国务。

original: Elizabeth Wilbraham
translation: 伊丽莎白·威尔布拉罕

original: The first English female architect Elizabeth Wilbraham has designed a multitude of family residences and churches.
translation: 作为第一个英格兰女性建筑师，伊丽莎白·威尔布拉罕设计了许多家庭住宅和教堂。

original: Anna Bunina
translation: 安娜·布宁娜

original: The Inexperienced Muse" was her first work, and it did not take long before Anna Bunina became the first female Russian writer who managed to make a living solely from literary work.
translation: 在处女座《没有经验的缪斯》发表久后，安娜·布宁娜便成为了第一个专职以写作为生的俄罗斯女作家。

original: Nanyehi
translation: 南耶希

original: The Beloved Woman Nanyehi's actions changed the roles of Cherokee women. She was a good negotiator and a brave woman of great diplomatic skill who believed that the Cherokee should live in peaceful coexistence with people of different cultures and from different countries.
translation: “亲爱的女人”南耶希的所作所为改变了切罗基部落中女人的角色。她是一名优秀的谈判家，一个拥有高超外交技能的勇敢女人，她相信切罗基部落应该与不同国家，不同文化的人们共同和平相处。

original: Vendela Skytte
translation: 温德拉·斯奎特

original: The ideal female academic had a quite unusual education for a woman. Vendela Skytte's father believed that she should have the same education as her brothers and made sure she studied theology, ethics, history, philology and geology.
translation: 对女性来讲，这位理想中的女学者所受到的教育是十分不寻常的。温德拉·斯奎特的父亲相信她应该与她的兄弟们受到同样的在神学，伦理，历史，哲学和地理学上的教育。

original: Mumtaz Mahal
translation: 穆塔兹·马哈尔

original: Chosen one of the Palace" was her title, her real name was Arjumand Banu Begum. Her husband loved her so much that he grieved for a year when she died during the childbirth of their fourteenth child.
translation: 她的原名为阿姬曼·芭奴，也被称为「宫中获选者」。她的丈夫是那么的爱她，以至于当她在诞下第14个孩子时难产去世后他整整哀悼了一整年。

original: Queen Pokou
translation: 波科女王

original: The settlers of the Ivory Coast took the name Baoule to honor their leader Pokou who sacrificed her infant son to allow them to cross the wild waters of the Komoe river.
translation: 象牙海岸附近的居民将自己称作巴欧利人，以纪念为了让他们通过科莫埃河而牺牲了自己幼子的女王波科。

original: Heo Nanseolheon
translation: 许兰雪轩

original: The Tang tradition of folklore and natural imagery shines in the early works of Heo Nanseolheon, but her unhappy marriage led her to write lamenting about the plight and sufferings of married women.
translation: 虽然在许兰雪轩的早期作品中闪烁着唐诗中有关民俗传说和自然景象的传统，她不愉快的婚姻生活使得她后期的作品更多地抒发着已婚女性所受的苦难和折磨。

original: Mariam-uz-Zamani
translation: 马里昂-乌兹-扎马尼

original: An astute businesswoman, beloved wife and mother and one of the few women who have been granted the privilege of issue farmans, Mariam-uz-Zamani was a wealthy and influential woman at the Mughal court.
translation: 作为一个精明的商人，一位受宠爱的妻子与母亲，和少数几个被授予签署法曼权利的女子，马里昂-乌兹-扎马尼是莫卧儿宫廷中一位富有而有影响力的女人。
